title: Fibromyalgia Symptoms And Treatment - FAQ
description:
Application with didactic purposes that contains a list of articles with the options of offline mode, reading mode, text to speech, bookmark of favorites, reading history and search engine.

In the application you will find articles such as:
 
💎 Why Fibromyalgia Is So Puzzling
📝 Fibromyalgia is a poorly understood disorder defined by widespread chronic pain. Reviewed by a board-certified vascular neurologist.

💎 Fibromyalgia: Causes, Symptoms & Treatment - When Seconds Count
📝 What is fibromyalgia? Learn about the causes, symptoms and treatment options through ASA.

💎 Fibromyalgia: Symptoms, Causes, Treatment
📝 Learn about fibromyalgia from the Cleveland Clinic. Find out about fibromyalgia symptoms, treatment options, causes, prevention & more.

💎 Fibromyalgia: Causes, Diagnosis and Treatments
📝 Fibromyalgia is a chronic condition characterized by fatigue and widespread pain in muscles and joints. It affects more women than men.

💎 Fibromyalgia | Arthritis | CDC
📝 Basic information about fibromyalgia, including common symptoms and treatment.

💎 Fibromyalgia Treatment, Tests, Causes & Symptoms
📝 Get information on fibromyalgia (FM, fibrositis) treatment (Lyrica), diagnosis (tender points), symptoms (chronic pain, fatigue), causes, diet, and medications (Cymbalta, Lyrica). Fibromyalgia is a disease that causes chronic pain in the ligaments and muscles.

💎 Fibromyalgia: Causes, Symptoms & Treatment
📝 What is fibromyalgia? Learn about the causes, symptoms and treatment options through ASA.

💎 Why Fibromyalgia Is So Puzzling
📝 Fibromyalgia is a poorly understood disorder defined by widespread chronic pain. Learn more about the symptoms, causes, diagnosis, and treatments.

💎 Fibromyalgia Symptoms, Treatment & More/b>
📝 Learn about fibromyalgia from the Cleveland Clinic. Find out about fibromyalgia symptoms, treatment options, causes, prevention & more.

💎 Fibromyalgia: Causes, Diagnosis and Treatments
📝 Fibromyalgia is a chronic condition characterized by fatigue and widespread pain in muscles and joints. It affects more women than men.

💎 Fibromyalgia
📝 Fibromyalgia is a condition associated with widespread pain and tenderness.

💎 Fibromyalgia | Arthritis
📝 Basic information about fibromyalgia, including common symptoms and treatment.

💎 Fibromyalgia
📝 Fibromyalgia is characterised by long-term muscle pain and fatigue and is most commonly diagnosed in women aged 25 to 55 years: causes, symptoms, diagnosis, treatment.

💎 Fibromyalgia Treatment, Tests, Causes & Symptoms
📝 Get information on fibromyalgia (FM, fibrositis) treatment (Lyrica), diagnosis (tender points), symptoms (chronic pain, fatigue), causes, diet, and medications (Cymbalta, Lyrica). Fibromyalgia is a disease that causes chronic pain in the ligaments and muscles.

💎 Fibromyalgia: what is it, symptoms, treatment and pain areas
📝 Fibromyalgia is a syndrome that causes pain in the body for more than 3 months, tiredness and sleep disorders. Although there is no cure, symptoms can be improved with treatment. Know the main symptoms and treatment options.

💎 Fibromyalgia: Causes, Symptoms, and Treatment/b>
📝 Fibromyalgia is a complex disease that affects millions of people around the world. Understand fibromyalgia's causes, symptoms, and treatment options.

💎 Fibromyalgia Symptoms, Diagnosis & Treatment
📝 What is fibromyalgia? Fibromyalgia is a chronic condition that causes pain and stiffness of the tendons, muscles, and joints. Learn about fibromyalgia symptoms, treatment and tender points. 

* Fibromyalgia Symptoms, Diagnosis, Treatments and Causes 
* Fibromyalgia Symptoms, Natural Treatment & Diet  
* Treatment for Fibromyalgia Pain  
* Fibromyalgia Symptoms in Women: Periods, IBS and More

title: Fibromyalgia Support
description:
MyFibroTeam is a social network and support group for those living with fibromyalgia. Get the emotional support you need from others like you, get practical tips to manage your life with fibromyalgia, and insights about treatment or therapies. MyFibroTeam is the only social network where you can truly connect, make real friendships, and share daily ups and downs in a judgment-free place.

-Keep up and follow members photos & updates
-Quick photo buttons so you don't miss a beat 
-Post updates about the daily ups & downs 
-Get/Give instant hugs, likes & comments of support 
-Search the Q+A section/ask and answer questions 
-Add others to your team 
-Find others near you and like you
-Add your diagnosis and view others

MyFibroTeam is for those living with fibromyalgia.


We welcome your feedback! 
Please email us at support@myfibroteam.com with your comments & suggestions.

title: Manage My Pain
description:
Chronic pain affects 1 in 5 individuals. It can be hard to explain to friends, family, and doctors. It can feel like it's taking control of your life and your mental health. Learn to conquer your chronic pain. Manage My Pain helps you and others better understand what you are going through. It has helped thousands of people with conditions like fibromyalgia, headaches, arthritis, or back pain better understand their symptoms and provide evidence of their pain for their doctors, insurance companies, or government agencies. Manage My Pain was created in partnership with industry-leading pain researchers - your doctor will actually read the reports from our app! Our daily reflections help people focus on their meaningful activities as opposed to the limitations created by their pain.

Manage My Pain will help you:
• Record how you're feeling: Easily describe your pain in less than 30 seconds
• Understand your unique pain criteria: Fully customizable options with each pain record let you identify factors such as how your pain feels, what the factors made the pain worse, which medications help you with your pain, and many more
• Reflect on your day: Take your mind off pain and record activities that are meaningful to you
• Highlight patterns and trends: Charts and graphs describe your results and get more powerful over time
• Track how well your meds are working: Add any medication to your profile and mark if it helps manage your pain
• Describe your pain to your doctor: Summarize your pain through unique reports that your doctor will actually read

Developed for patients suffering from and care-givers or medical professionals treating: 
• arthritis & rheumatism
• cancer 
• chronic pain
• headaches & migraines 
• fibromyalgia 

Use this pain management app to replace your hand-written: 
• pain diary 
• pain journal 
• pain log 
• pain tracker 

The Pro version adds the ability to view or report on more than the last 30 days. Reports are free to generate, however, those that contain advanced sections may require an additional credit to be purchased. An optional monthly subscription can be purchased so that an unlimited number of reports with advanced sections may be generated without the need for credits.

comments: **UPDATE** after receiving response from customer support (which was expedient and right on the money for what I needed). I absolutely LOVE this app!!! (upgrade from 4 stars to 5!!) Once I was clear on how to use app, I really appreciate having somewhere to log my daily concerns. I do wish there were more specific body parts, but I LOVE that u can put notes in and be more specific there.

Really great free app with incredibly reasonably priced premium levels (although I've not needed to upgrade from free yet so can't comment on their pros & cons). You can add your own pain descriptors and chart things like mental fog and fatigue. It doesn't take too long to fill out and you can easily change the entry date. The only thing I "don't like" is that it defaults to filling out the daily reflection rather than pain when opening the app. Definitely recommend for chronic pain sufferers!

Really useful for tracking pain, and I like all the options they give you for stuff. Plus you can make your own! I just started tracking my pain and this app has helped give a visual of how much I neglect to address my physical health. Glad I stumbled upon this :)

I started using this app because I know I will need a lengthy history to be diagnosed with fibromyalgia. I like how easy this app is to use and record my daily symptoms and over all how Im feeling. This app is super helpful.
Love this. Most apps that track your activities etc are very limited without subscribing but this one has a lot of free features and is a great way of keeping track of patterns

title: Fibromyalgia Relief
description:
Fibromyalgia seems more a disease of mime explained in the charades of other ailments.
The majority of persons suffering from Fibromyalgia have undergone numerous tests
with multiple diagnoses before a medical professional reaches the diagnosis of
Fibromyalgia.

Aspirin will often relieve a headache but the headache is not brought on by a deficiency
of aspirin, therefore aspirin is not a cure for the headache but rather an aid in the relief
of headache symptoms. When headaches reoccur we begin to look beyond the ease of
symptoms for the root cause. Many times the cause of a headache is stress, muscle
fatigue, spinal alignment, digestion issues, body temperature, lack of oxygen in the
blood stream, dehydration, or a precursory sign of infection just to mention a few. One
could almost conclude a headache as an early warning device of malfunction within the
human machine but then aspirin should merely be considered a temporary fix while
transitioning through the repair. 

Chronic headache often is one of the many symptoms associated with Fibromyalgia but
Fibromyalgia seems the mime portraying a spectrum of symptoms as an impressionist
portraying personalities. It is the vast arrays of symptoms that go and come, appear or
disappear that seem to make Fibromyalgia difficult to diagnose and treat because as a
whole we are a society that treats the symptoms first; much like taking aspirin for a
headache. When we relieve the symptom, usually discomfort or pain, we tend to rejoice
in the relief and call it good. 

There are as many causes to the mere symptom of a headache as there are symptoms to
Fibromyalgia. 

In this apps book, From Pain to Freedom, we will journey through the forest of
Fibromyalgia symptoms, medical diagnosis, pain markers, symptom relief and press
forward to Freedom Valley. With that said, it takes an open mind and a willingness to
embrace that which is new to us in order to persevere forward. 

The science of medicine today is absolutely astounding but equally so is the study of
medical procedure and herbal symptom cures of ancient tribal cultures. Is it possible the
“healing touch” of tribal spiritual leaders may have been the gateway to chiropractic care
today? If you are of the belief that the body was designed to heal itself than you must
also embrace that the power of the mind is in essence a major factor in that healing. If
common sense tells you that a scale equally weighted is considered balanced than
consideration might be paid that equality between mind and body would symbolize
being balanced as an entity of one. 

Relief from the symptoms of Fibromyalgia is a huge progressive step but without
exploring the cause behind the symptoms and effort put forth to elevate or better control
its causes it becomes a vicious circle of painful insanity. 

From Pain to Freedom is an eye opening guide to the possibilities of a life free from
the shackles of Fibromyalgia. Obviously I state “Guide to the possibilities” not a cure to
Fibromyalgia. Learning different pain management techniques as well as the triggers
that entice the painful symptoms could be considered the avoidance of Fibromyalgia
symptoms and without symptoms or pain----well, you judge the name to that outcome. 

You will learn the medical side of study into Fibromyalgia as to its suspected onset
cause, diagnoses of prevalent symptoms and symptom and pain management as well as
the naturopathic method to Fibromyalgia management which takes in an entire
spectrum of all methods not encompassed by modern day medical science. Naturopathic
study lends a hand of enlightenment to modern medical science but modern medical
science is not often as accommodating to the study of naturopathy. Ignorance is closing
a blind eye for a blind eye has no advantageous purpose to being closed.

comments: Helpful... Grateful to you

Not helpful information. I have found better, more helpful and more accurate information doing my own google searches than what is found in this "informational" app. Also, put down the damn thesaurus...using flowery words does not make your information valid just because you're using big fancy words. I dont recommend this app because it could lead users to cause more pain or discomfort for themselves if they dont carefully research anything found within the app. This is not a reputable source.

title: PainScale - Free Chronic Pain Tracker Diary
description:
The Popular pain tracking app for iOS and Android !.  Awarded one of the Best Fibromyalgia apps of 2019 – by Healthline. Join over 100,000 chronic pain patients who manage and scale their pain and symptoms with Painscale; the highly-ranked pain tracker health app on the web! 

The PainScale app offers a FREE suite of pain management tools to help chronic pain patients to scale their pain.
Manage a Pain Tracker Diary!

Created with input from doctors and chronic pain patients, the Pain Diary acts as a pain tracker and organizes all the information the patient needs in one accessible location. With over 800 organized articles, health tips, exercises, information on pain meditation programs and treatment options, pain management becomes easier.   	

PainScale provides personalized pain management education for users. Trusted content. is available to help people understand their symptoms and better manage their condition. By providing insights to a community of other patients who share their treatment information, PainScale helps patients discover information about treatment options that may work for their condition.
PainScale is an easy and simple to use, pain and health tracker app.
 
Features

 • Pain Diary – log and track your pain to track triggers, pain intensity, symptoms, treatments, medications, activity, mood, and sleep digital scale.
 • Pain Reports – get and send summary and detailed reports for better patient-physician communication, you can take all the information you need from the Pain Diary.
 • Insights - personal tips to help you discover information about treatment options to better manage your condition
• Trusted Content – get FREE access to a searchable library of articles, videos, and meditations to help find pain relief,
 • Daily Health Tips – get daily meditation, stretches, and exercise routines, everything you need to help you cope with your chronic pain
 • Integration with Google Fit – simplified and seamless connectivity with Google Fit for tracking health and fitness activity
 • Reminders – get reminders to help stay engaged with restoring your health
 • Care Team Communication - tap-to-call and tap-to message functionality options that connects you directly with your Physician and Support Network
 • Customize your experience for pain management with a personal profile
Get the info you need in the following topics:

 • Chronic pain
 • Pain relief
 • Lower back pain
 • Back pain
 • Neck pain
 • A migraine
 • Fibromyalgia
 • Failed back surgery
 • CRPS
 • Arthritis
 • Pain management
 • Coping
 • Neuropathy
 • Nerve pain

Get Help: contact us at help@painscale.com
Visit Us: Access your account on the web.

Log in at https://www.painscale.com
Like Us: Join the PainScale community by liking us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/MyPainScale/
 

What are the things that make your pain increase, what spikes or triggers it, and what helps you the most?
PainScale helps you get actionable insights to better your pain relief and health in general. 

Pain scale and pain diary have been used by physicians for almost five decades – it is one of the most valuable tools in pain management. Painscale.com takes advantage of the modern digital technologies to provide an easy to use pain tracking solution using the same proven pain management methods. PainScale.com web site and the app is designed for educational purposes only. If you have any concerns about your own health or the health of someone else, you should always consult with a physician or other healthcare professional

comments: Outstanding App to help you track pain types, areas and symptoms. Able to show different pain types in different areas of the body. I love that you can add notes as well in journal entries! The reports are fantastic and easy to email with you deciding the custom time span. The insights that can show correlation between activity, weather, and other triggers really helps. Love that I can attach to Samsung Health and thus my sleep, EKGs and pulse rate, BP, etc to see correlations! Great App!!!

I've been using this app for months now and I still love it. It's easy to use, it syncs with my Samsung Health, and the helpful articles and tips are normally quick reads and informative, and it has easy adjustments in the settings. I highly recommend this app.

So far it's a good useful app. One suggestion. Love to have ability to add multiple entries during the day without altering my earlier input.This will help me better track triggers and effectiveness of the different things I do to help alleviate my pain. Also, there needs to be room for more than one entry for doc location,insurance& pain on opposite side of the body.If I have pain in back of legs and knees, the figure turns around but deleted the previous tagged body pain location.

I've only been using this app for a short time but so far it is the best that I have tried. I have chronic pain with various etiologies and the app has a detailed pain map that allows me to more precisely record my pain. The automatic time stamp is a great feature as is the ability to link it to my Fitbit for superior insights that corralate sleep and activity to pain levels. Im holding off on that 5th star because I am still learning the app and all of its functionality.

The PainScale app has been great! I am able to track my whole day. Pain, food and anything else I need. I have added my glucose readings in the notes. I am also able to put on there my activities making me able to see any issues and also my progress. Thank you!

title: Fibromyalgia Magazine
description:
Fibromyalgia Magazine is a monthly 28 page magazine that has been providing support for the worldwide fibromyalgia FaMily since October 2000.
Fibromyalgia (FM) is a widespread musculoskeletal pain and fatigue disorder probably caused by a dysfunction of endogenous pain regulation leading to amplification of pain signals from all over the body. Studies demonstrate that FM in the general population has a prevalence ranging from 1.3 to 7.3 per cent.
Every month for over 10 years we have been trying to answer all the questions that a fibromyalgia sufferer may ask; be it a newly diagnosed patient or a long term FM’er looking for help with pain relief, fatigue or any other associated problem.

Medical Research News
Campaigning
Lobbying
Awareness Raising
Legal Advice
Benefits Advice
Worldwide news
News from local support groups and charities
Treatment Advice
Pharmaceutical News
Alternative Therapies
Pain Management
On line directory of all support groups and phone friends
A nationwide directory of FM resources
Opinion and Entertainment from our unrivalled team of columnists

UK Fibromyalgia are committed to ensuring that all people with fibromyalgia have access to fast and accurate diagnosis, that they receive effective evidence based treatments and that they are not discriminated against because of their condition.

-------------------------------
This is a free app download. Within the app users can purchase the current issue and back issues. 
Subscriptions are also available within the application. A subscription will start from the latest issue. 

Available subscriptions are: 

1 month: £1.99 / USD $1.99 (1 issue)
12 months: £16.99 / USD $16.99 (12 issues) 

-The subscription will renew automatically unless cancelled more than 24 hours before the end of the current period. You will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, for the same duration and at the current subscription rate for the product. 
-You may turn off the auto-renewal of subscriptions through your Account Settings, however you are not able to cancel the current subscription during its active period. 
-Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase and any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when a subscription to that publication is purchased. 

Users can register for/ login to a Pocketmags account in-app. This will protect their issues in the case of a lost device and allow browsing of purchases on multiple platforms. Existing Pocketmags users can retrieve their purchases by logging into their account. 

We recommend loading the app for the first time in a Wi-Fi area so that all issue data is retrieved. 
If your app will not load after a first install or an update, please delete and reinstall the app from the App Store 

Help and frequently asked questions be accessed in-app and on Pocketmags. 
If you have any problems at all, please do not hesitate to contact us: help@pocketmags.com 
-------------------- 
You can find our privacy policy here: 
http://www.pocketmags.com/privacy.aspx 

You can find our terms and conditions here: 
http://www.pocketmags.com/terms.aspx

title: FibromyalgNah
description:
This app allows those afflicted with fibromyalgia to document instances of "flares" (a short-term increase in fibro symptoms like pain or fatigue), medications/supplements, and treatments. This information can help you discover patterns and improve your treatment decisions.

FibromyalgNah helps you say Nah! to fibromyalgia by empowering you with tools of knowledge. Knowledge of what may be triggering your flairs and what may help you treat them.
descriptionHTML:
This app allows those afflicted with fibromyalgia to document instances of "flares" (a short-term increase in fibro symptoms like pain or fatigue), medications/supplements, and treatments. This information can help you discover patterns and improve your treatment decisions.

FibromyalgNah helps you say Nah! to fibromyalgia by empowering you with tools of knowledge. Knowledge of what may be triggering your flairs and what may help you treat them.
summary: Document your fibromyalgia to understand flare causes and better your treatment.
recentChanges: Improved color scheme to be less hard on the eyes.
comments: It is so important to be able to keep track of patterns when you have Fibromyalgia but due to the FibroFog, it can be quite difficult. I've spent months trying to figure out a convenient way to track on my own with no success. I'm so glad there is FINALLY an app that not only will track, but makes it easy to update. If you have Fibromyalgia (or another chronic illness that results in flares/PEM) you should give this a try. It also records what you log by day, so I can use it when I go to the doctor to show rather than failingly try to remember everything. Thank you for creating this much needed app; it is sure to help a lot of people to better manage their health.
Please add pain level, dates flare lasted until. Location of flare.
Not what I expected no diagrams of body

title: Fibroline
description:
Fibroline Senior es una aplicación creada para ayudar a mejorar la calidad de vida de las personas con fibromialgia o dolor crónico generalizado.

Fibroline Senior tiene como objetivo proporcionar un tratamiento riguroso y de calidad. La aplicación aporta recursos para afrontar la enfermedad, y enseña estrategias para gestionar el dolor desde un enfoque cognitivo-conductual. Gracias a Fibroline, sus usuarios podrán aprender a dormir mejor, gestionar la ansiedad, tomar la medicación de forma adecuada, regular el estado de ánimo o mejorar la relación con los demás, además de reducir o eliminar el dolor y la fatiga.

title: Bearable - Symptoms & Mood tracker
description:
✅ All health tracking in one place

Tired of juggling multiple apps to keep track of your mood, symptoms, sleep, exercise, diet, and medication? We think all of this should be kept in one convenient place so that you and your health professional can get the full picture.

✅ Reclaim control over your well-being

Bearable empowers people to reclaim control over their well-being by making mood and symptom tracking simple, convenient, and accessible to all. Making entries in our health diary is quick and effortless, so you can focus more energy on getting better.  

The app has been shaped by our community of thousands of people with varying chronic health issues.

✅ Gain useful insights with just a few clicks a day

With just a few simple clicks each day our intelligent health diary can help you to gain insights into which daily activities and health factors are positively and negatively affecting your mental and physical health.


Bearable helps you to:

✔️ Record your mood and symptoms in seconds, or go into more detail with an additional note. 
✔️ Fully customise your daily activities and health factors, such as sleep, diet, exercise and medication/supplements. 
✔️ Gain insights into how your daily activities and health factors impact your mood and symptoms using our graphs, calendar and stats pages.
✔️ Keep everything in one place with our neat health timeline, so that you can get the full picture. Use our search function to filter just what you want to see or show your health professional.
✔️ Come prepared to your next doctor or therapist appointment - no need to struggle to remember a detailed health timeline for the last week or month.
✔️ Make journaling a healthy habit with our quick, simple and enjoyable entry process.

And there’s much more…

➕ Set Reminders - Fully customise your reminders, whether it's a general reminder to make a diary entry or a reminder to take your medication and supplements. 
➕ Share and Export -  Export data securely to yourself or your health professional
➕ Automatic health data sync - You can choose to allow the app to automatically gather data such as Sleep and Steps taken from your phone.
➕ Dark mode - Change at night to a display easier on the eyes.
➕ Restore data across devices - Restore your data between Apple & Android devices.


🔐 PRIVATE & SECURE

Rest easy knowing your data is encrypted securely on our servers. You have full control over your data and can delete it from within the app at any time.  It’s important to emphasise that we will never under any circumstances sell any personal data to anyone.


💟 MADE BY PEOPLE WHO UNDERSTAND AND CARE

Created by individuals who have lived with mental and physical health issues themselves.  With feedback and feature requests from a research group of thousands of people with a wide variety of chronic diseases and health conditions, including Anxiety, Depression, CFS (ME), MS (Multiple Sclerosis), Fibromyalgia, Endometriosis, Bipolar, BPD, PTSD, Migraines, Headaches, Vertigo, Cancer (Chemo Symptoms), Arthritis, Crohns, Diabetes, IBS and IBD.  Our aim is to make our symptom tracker simple and accessible to everyone, even if suffering from the fatigue and brain fog that often accompanies many conditions.

We have created a real sense of community around Bearable and will continue to listen closely to those who need it most.  We are committed to continue improving upon this app that could help many people start to feel like they can reclaim control over their health.  If you have any questions, feedback or feature requests, please send them over to james@bearable.app.  We’d love to hear from you.




Credit to Freepik for icons

comments: This is absolutely the best of its kind. I have never seen such a comprehensive, customizable, well-designed app that serves as many functions as this one. I've already shown it to multiple friends/therapists. For those of you moaning about the cost... seriously, getting the subscription will set you back just over $2/month. I work professionally with highly impoverished individuals who do have to count every penny, but come on. Most people can shell out a couple bucks without harm.

The app lets you log your mood, any symptoms you are having, and a number of factors that you think may be affecting your mood/symptoms. The default categories to log are good, but you can add/remove/edit all of the categories to fit you better. It's super easy to fill out, even when I'm not feeling well. It (sometimes) feels like I'm logging meaningless information, but then when I click on the Insights tab, it shows me tons of relevant information about which factors are influencing my mood (or any other symptom I log!). Turns out listening to music and video chats work wonders for my mood--good to know! This is also a wonderful way to record how I'm feeling over time--it lets me easily decipher long-term changes in my wellbeing, which is great information to discuss with medical professionals.

I really like this app, it's easy to use and the design is nice and the ability to customize it to your needs is great. However, the syncing isn't very reliable. I have a phone and a tablet, and downloaded it on both, I tried to log in on the tablet, and only a few entries were visible. Later I went to look at the one on my phone, and half the entries are gone, and so are factors I added. I want to keep using this app, but if it's going to randomly forget things that's a problem.

I have tried multiple times in the past to find a way that I could easily log my moods in a way that felt nuanced and meaningful but also flexible and customizable, but this is the first app I have ever seen that got it right. For once, I am finding it convenient to do quick check ins and even monitor my food and water intake which I never thought I'd have the patience to do. You don't have to get premium, but it's well worth it at least to support a great app.

Brilliant App & well worth paying for. I wanted an app to record daily symptoms to enable me to give an accurate report to my GP. This app has everything I wanted & more. Being able to write notes by each symptom is so helpful & the insight reports are incredible. I did have a little snag when I first signed up for the free trial, but I made contact, explained the situation & James helped me to sort it all out. The app has been fantastic ever since. Thank you bearable team 🙏🏻🥰

title: Fibromialgia Diagnóstico
descriptionHTML:
"O Raciocínio Clínico é algo nobre, complexo e que pode ser facilitado por protocolos que sistematizem o conhecimento no assunto. Nesse sentido, esse aplicativo foi desenvolvido para integrar a competência diagnóstica do reumatologista, no diagnóstico de fibromialgia, à dimensão psicossocial que esses casos assumem e que varia de paciente para paciente. Esse App visa, portanto, descrever a avaliação de um paciente fibromiálgico na perspectiva mais ampla da dor crônica generalizada e, para isso, traz:

• Inicialmente, o diagnóstico diferencial sobre causas potencialmente secundárias (natureza inflamatória);
• Na sequência, uma calculadora para os critérios de fibromialgia;
• Segue com a esquematização de uma abordagem mais humanizada, mostrando o sofrimento gerado pela dor, em um atendimento centrado na pessoa e como o perfil psicológico varia nos casos de fibromialgia;
• Avança por um eixo psiquiátrico onde elenca os sinais de alerta de quando o caso deve ser encaminhado a um psiquiatra, tanto com transtornos mais comuns, quanto com transtornos mais complexos, como os de personalidade e;
• Finaliza com diretrizes sobre o tratamento não medicamentoso, incluindo as interfaces com outras especialidades e com os princípios do tratamento medicamentoso, com uma tabela final com as drogas utilizadas.

O App, portanto, é uma ferramenta auxiliar que pode ser muito valiosa para o seu dia-a-dia sem substituir, de maneira alguma, o raciocínio clínico."
summary: App was developed to integrate competence in the diagnosis of fibromyalgia.
recentChanges: App compatível com Android 10

title: Painkillr
description:
Pain is the most common symptom reported to health care providers. Pain is the driving force of health care services, and lost productivity. It is a significant burden for those individuals who suffer with it, as well as those who support them. 

Standard medical treatment for chronic pain is often inadequate, and it is common for frustrated patients to seek costly treatments from multiple healthcare professionals, often without significant relief. This can lead some people to believe they cannot be helped.

However, there is some good news. A growing awareness of the limitations of currently available pain treatments make the use of suggestion-based techniques and self-hypnosis an attractive component of pain treatment.


The empirical support for hypnosis for chronic pain management has flourished over the past two decades. Clinical trials show that suggestion based techniques are effective for reducing chronic pain, although outcomes vary between individuals. 

The findings from these clinical trials also show that such treatments have a number of positive effects beyond pain control. Many other treatment outcomes improve too. 

Better still you can apply suggestion-based strategies to yourself and get results.

title: ProFibro
description:
O aplicativo móvel ProFibro é uma ferramenta para auxiliar usuários portadores de fibromialgia no autocuidado. Foi concebido por profissionais de saúde especialistas na síndrome, com a contribuição de outros profissionais qualificados em suas respectivas áreas de atuação e pacientes portadores da síndrome. Suas funcionalidades e conteúdo foram desenvolvidos com base na experiência clínica e na melhor evidência científica disponível na literatura.

Explorando o ProFibro app, o usuário poderá aumentar seu conhecimento sobre a fibromialgia e seu tratamento, organizar suas atividades de vida diária, reduzindo a sobrecarga, acompanhar a evolução de seu estado de saúde, experimentar estratégias para melhorar o sono, aprender a lidar com a síndrome junto com seus familiares, iniciar um programa de exercício físico, registrar e compartilhar suas experiências com familiares, amigos, colegas e profissionais de saúde.

O ProFibro app foi testado em um ensaio clínico com 40 participantes voluntários. Após seis semanas, os participantes que utilizaram o aplicativo apresentaram uma redução significante na severidade dos sintomas e no impacto geral da fibromialgia na qualidade de vida.

É um recurso complementar ao tratamento convencional, e não deve ser utilizado em substituição ao profissional de saúde. Recomenda-se que você compartilhe sua experiência com o ProFibro app com o profissional de saúde que o acompanha regularmente.

O ProFibro app foi desenvolvido pela doutoranda Susan Lee King Yuan, MSc, sob a orientação da Profa. Dra. Amélia Pasqual Marques, no programa de pós-graduação em Ciências da Reabilitação da Faculdade de Medicina da Universidade de São Paulo. O projeto foi financiado pela FAPESP, Fundação de Amparo à Pesquisa do Estado de São Paulo. A designer Raquel de Castro Dantas Cavalcante desenvolveu a interface, e a tecnóloga em tecnologia da informação Susiane Rodrigues dos Santos é a responsável pela programação do aplicativo. As fisioterapeutas Adriana de Sousa do Espírito Santo, Juliana Costa Moreira Panaro e Luciana Akemi Matsutani contribuíram na definição dos objetivos e conteúdo do aplicativo. Agradecemos Áquila Neemias pela contribuição na produção dos áudios e da animação, Letícia Assis Couto pela valiosa contribuição na avaliação dos participantes e Ingred de Souza na alocação nos grupos do ensaio clínico. Finalmente, agradecemos aos voluntários portadores de fibromialgia que participaram com dedicação do desenvolvimento e do teste do aplicativo no ensaio clínico.

Suporte técnico
Tecgo Susiane Rodrigues dos Santos. Email: suporteprofibro@gmail.com.

Informações de contato
Susan Lee King Yuan, MSc. Email: susanlkyuan@yahoo.com.br.
Departamento de Fisioterapia, Fonoaudiologia e Terapia Ocupacional
Faculdade de Medicina da Universidade de São Paulo
Rua Cipotânea, 51 – Cidade Universitária
CEP 05360-000
São Paulo - SP
descriptionHTML:
O aplicativo móvel ProFibro é uma ferramenta para auxiliar usuários portadores de fibromialgia no autocuidado. Foi concebido por profissionais de saúde especialistas na síndrome, com a contribuição de outros profissionais qualificados em suas respectivas áreas de atuação e pacientes portadores da síndrome. Suas funcionalidades e conteúdo foram desenvolvidos com base na experiência clínica e na melhor evidência científica disponível na literatura.

Explorando o ProFibro app, o usuário poderá aumentar seu conhecimento sobre a fibromialgia e seu tratamento, organizar suas atividades de vida diária, reduzindo a sobrecarga, acompanhar a evolução de seu estado de saúde, experimentar estratégias para melhorar o sono, aprender a lidar com a síndrome junto com seus familiares, iniciar um programa de exercício físico, registrar e compartilhar suas experiências com familiares, amigos, colegas e profissionais de saúde.

O ProFibro app foi testado em um ensaio clínico com 40 participantes voluntários. Após seis semanas, os participantes que utilizaram o aplicativo apresentaram uma redução significante na severidade dos sintomas e no impacto geral da fibromialgia na qualidade de vida.

É um recurso complementar ao tratamento convencional, e não deve ser utilizado em substituição ao profissional de saúde. Recomenda-se que você compartilhe sua experiência com o ProFibro app com o profissional de saúde que o acompanha regularmente.

O ProFibro app foi desenvolvido pela doutoranda Susan Lee King Yuan, MSc, sob a orientação da Profa. Dra. Amélia Pasqual Marques, no programa de pós-graduação em Ciências da Reabilitação da Faculdade de Medicina da Universidade de São Paulo. O projeto foi financiado pela FAPESP, Fundação de Amparo à Pesquisa do Estado de São Paulo. A designer Raquel de Castro Dantas Cavalcante desenvolveu a interface, e a tecnóloga em tecnologia da informação Susiane Rodrigues dos Santos é a responsável pela programação do aplicativo. As fisioterapeutas Adriana de Sousa do Espírito Santo, Juliana Costa Moreira Panaro e Luciana Akemi Matsutani contribuíram na definição dos objetivos e conteúdo do aplicativo. Agradecemos Áquila Neemias pela contribuição na produção dos áudios e da animação, Letícia Assis Couto pela valiosa contribuição na avaliação dos participantes e Ingred de Souza na alocação nos grupos do ensaio clínico. Finalmente, agradecemos aos voluntários portadores de fibromialgia que participaram com dedicação do desenvolvimento e do teste do aplicativo no ensaio clínico.

Suporte técnico
Tecgo Susiane Rodrigues dos Santos. Email: suporteprofibro@gmail.com.

CEP 05360-000
São Paulo - SP

please make an english translation of this app! i love the idea but i only 
speak english

a Fibrose Pulmonar e Esclerodermia! Ao idealizador/ dora meu agradecimento 
profundo!

Otimo aplicativo para quem tem fibromialgia auxilando no seu cuidado diário, assim como esclarece a ajuda os familiares e pessoas que convivem com alguém que tem essa condição. Eu tenho fibromialgia, instalei o aplicativo e foi excelente para esclarecer muita coisa sobre a sindrome que não tinha conhecimento e me auxiliar no tratamento. Gratidão as pessoas que criaram esse aplicativo.

title: Symptom Tracker & Medicine, Health Symptoms Diary
description:
💊CareClinic is more than a health symptom tracker or symptoms diary app. CareClinic is your daily all-in-one Health & Wellness App that helps you measure, learn, and improve your health. 

👨‍⚕️CareClinic helps you never forget your meds or pills again! This is a must-have medication tracker and reminder app for your health & wellness.  Don’t put your loved ones at risk by missing a pill or tablet and over dosing due to forgetfulness. 

CareClinic works well for medication management, people also use it as a headache tracker, symptom tracker and symptoms diary or journal. Track vitamins, supplements, birth control, conditions, medication, symptoms, nutrition, activity, daily vitals, therapies, pregnancy, baby symptoms, notes and automatically discover correlations & triggers.


👪Reasons People Choose Us

✔️CREATE A CARE PLAN -- Used as a treatment & pill organizer 📅
- Don’t create a just a medication list. Add Drugs, Meds, Vitamins, Minerals, Natural Remedies, Therapies, Fitness & Nutrition as part of your care plan
- Built in Drugs & Supplements database
- Set dose form, dose color & set medicine reminders quickly

✔️SCHEDULE MEDICATION REMINDERS ⏰
- Set pill reminders, appointments, refill reminders, vitamin reminders or supplement trackers
- Set reminders for entire regimens or specifics like contraceptive pill
- Mark medication reminders as Taken or Snooze
- See adherence reports from the pill tracker when you mark drugs as taken
- Medicine Reminders can automatically adjust to new time zones

✔️DAILY CHECK-IN DIARY 📖
- Check-in to record your treatment progress alongside medication reminders. 
- Include PRN, Photos, Weight, Sleep, Blood Pressure, Energy, Memory, Mood, Pain Log, Blood Pressure, Pulse & Temperature
- Log Therapies: Meditation, Mindfulness, CBT, LLLT, Fitness

✔️MULTIPLE USES: TRACK SYMPTOMS, TRACK GOALS, HABITS, HEADACHES, MIGRAINES ❤️
- Use the diary as a symptom diary or use the symptom tracker value scale to log symptom severity
- Track & Journal anything: Such as a pain tracker and pain journal for chronic pain or a symptom diary for pain, migraines, headaches, mood or medication

✔️ADD YOUR CARE TEAM TO SHARE REPORTS & INSIGHTS 👨‍⚕️
- Save Caregiver information for future reference
- Add Caregiver pill alerts for missed dosages, have someone help you stay on track of your goals
- Allow Caregivers to view your care plan & reports. Share Symptom reports from your medicine tracker directly with family

✔️ MONITOR PROGRESS with REPORTS, LOGS and CORRELATIONS (TRIGGERS) 📊
- Summarized reports from your check-ins in charts, see what works and what doesn't alongside your goals.
- See total adherence from your med reminders

✔️INTEGRATE With WEARABLES 📲
- Apple Health & Google Fit

✔️Save & Share Health Appointments

✔️Save Health Immunization & Vaccinations Records

✔️COMPLETE HEALTH PLANNER ⛑
- Take a photo of your prescription to enter meds, no typing needed!
- Additional use cases: Mood Tracker, Pain Tracker, Track Urine, PMS, Stool, Food Allergy and GI Symptoms
- Securely Syncs & Backups with Desktop Web App at https://start.careclinic.io/ 
- Restore data on any device
- Track multiple care plans for family members like kids and seniors
- Automatically get calories, micronutrient and macronutrients for food & drinks 🥑 🥦

👍🏽Essential for managing any chronic illness or health symptoms: Chronic Pain, Cancer, Fibromyalgia, IBD & IBS (Bowel Movements), Urine, Diabetes Care, COPD, Epilepsy, Psoriasis, Rheumatoid Arthritis, Fibromyalgia, Multiple sclerosis (MS Symptoms), IPF. Also for mental health: ADHD, Headache Tracker, Depression, Anxiety, PMS & other disorders

$6.99/m or $59.99/yr subscription for more features. More affordable than other medication trackers, Medisafe!

- New Factors Tracker: Record factors that affect your health, such as: Virus Risk Factors, Digestion, Social Time, Weather, Cravings, Ailments or add your own health factors with icons!

comments: Works well as medication reminder! Using it to track my mood for CBT. I've upgraded to be able to share my treatment with my family and therapist.. Didn't see this functionality in other apps.
It is free to use so I like it <3 I use it to manage my health and wellness… I was looking for the livongo app to track diabetes and set insulin reminders, but this one is good too.
App freezes every time I try to cancel subscription.

To me, the app was not user-friendly. I found myself entering the same information repeatedly and sometimes the data just would not save (specifically in the Goals section). Second, the format provides low visibility. I was looking for something thst displays data like a calendar with icons and notes to show my doctors an overall picture of my health for each day. This is more like a database that has to be searched by individual criteria. I can't use this app in its current format.
Simple and organized; has a user-friendly interface! A very helpful app!

title: Anti inflammatory Diet: Healthy & Immunity Booster
description:
Anti Inflammatory Diet Recipes will help you tackle the inflammation and infections and boost your immune system.

This Anti Inflammatory Recipes App provides a vast collection of offline healthy recipes to help you combat degenerative lifestyle disorders like obesity, body stress, gut ailments, allergies and catch up on your antioxidants & micronutrients.

Relish on Anti-Inflammatory Recipes and wisely select your diet nutrition needs of fruits, veggies, herbs, seafood and beverages.

To discover the secret of staying healthy and in shape, the healthy way by eating right, download this Anti Inflammatory Diet Recipes for free!

Categories under Anti-Inflammatory Food Recipes are:-

*Taste Bud- Sweet, Sour, Tangy and more.
*Courses- Appetizer/Starter, Soup, Entree, Dessert and more.
*Cooking Type- Boil, Bake, Roast and more.

Application features of Anti Inflammatory Healthy Diet Recipes are:-

*NUTRITIONAL value of all recipes and all ingredients.
*Cook “Hands-Free” by just listening to the ChefChili’s instructions.

comments: Tried to filter recipes according to AIP diet but it said no recipes were found. Thought this App was for AIP. FYI: AIP means no dairy, grains, gluten, Nightshades, nuts, seeds, eggs, processed oils, legumes, sugar additives & sugar, etc. Therefore, your recipes should accommodate all of these restrictions.
I love this app, i found remedies that i tried out. And they worked. Also went shopping for fruits and vegetables that would help give me a boost. Thank you!
The only actual AIP recipes (No nuts, grains, dairy, seeds, nightshade, eggs, refined sugars and oils) on this app are for Orange juice.
Useful to diabetics and heart issues.
Your recipes are the best and i enjoyed it

title: Flaredown for Chronic Illness
description:
Flaredown is a website and mobile app that makes it easy to monitor your chronic illness.

- Flaredown remembers your details and creates an easy check-in each day

- Track conditions, symptoms, and treatments

- Tag your day with details about things that may interact with your illness

- Visually compare your data to test out your treatments and find triggers

- Talk with other users and learn from their experience
descriptionHTML:
Flaredown is a website and mobile app that makes it easy to monitor your chronic illness.

- Flaredown remembers your details and creates an easy check-in each day

- Track conditions, symptoms, and treatments

- Tag your day with details about things that may interact with your illness

- Visually compare your data to test out your treatments and find triggers

- Talk with other users and learn from their experience
summary: A simple, beautiful way to track your chronic illness.
recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: At first I like this app. I used it a year ago and then I took a break for several months. When I came back to it I wanted to change the symptoms the track as well as the medications. I was able to change it for one day but the next day it reset to my previous symptoms and treatments. Honestly I have so many treatments and symptoms that to remake this list every single day is extremely cumbersome. Therefore I no longer can use this app.

Very disappointed. Sounded like just the thing I needed, but it froze up when I was entering data to set up the account. I tried for an hour, but couldn't get past the screen to request or refuse reminders.

Reviews/comparison articles seem to be way off on this App. Downloaded to track pain in relation to a couple physical conditions. I wanted to relate this to triggers causing pain and also to actions/Meds to reduce pain. This app did not seem to do that or had such a lack of intuitive design that it was all but useless. Changed to Manage My Pain app and found 100% better or more what I needed. Not really sure what this app is intended for.....

Too many emails. Not useful for any of my conditions it doesn't have them and isn't as easy to use as expected. Disappointed with the app I had such high hopes for it but it let me down incredible with the available conditions and symptoms.

There were only a handful of conditions, treatments, etc and it wouldn't allow me to add my own option which makes it absolutely useless. I was told good things about this app but something seems to have gone horribly wrong between when they used it and now

summary: Clear your headspace with our free yoga app. Mediate, de-stress & feel relaxed!
comments: I like the different levels you can choose from. I have rheumatoid arthritis and some days I need beginner and some days I need intermediate. I also like that there is time to get a into a new pose before the timer starts so I don't have to rush getting my joints to cooperate.

Smashing little app. Most say beginners then give a crazy routine to do. This is perfect for those who like me have been out of shape for whatever reason and need to take things at an easier pace. Its not too easy. Just the right pace to get you ready for more adventurous poses. Thank you.

From long we were looking for an excercise/yoga app. We are very happy the way it has been designed. It's very user friendly and does what exactly a yoga app is supposed to do. It's been around one and half month and already it has made a place in our daily routine. Kudos to team. Hoping to see more options in android version too as many are available in iOS version.

I like this app and it's simple enough to use in my opinion but I'd say the instructor should be larger so it's easier to see the pose/position as being demonstrated. Other than that I still recommend it.

I would like the video to be able to go landscape on my phone and it didn't. I tried to turn it off to start another lesson and it kept playing. Have to uninstall it to stop it. Frustrating. But was enjoying the concept.

title: Daylio - Diary, Journal, Mood Tracker
description:
Daylio enables you to keep a private journal without having to type a single line. Try this beautifully designed & stunningly simple micro-diary app right now for FREE!


😁 WHAT IS DAYLIO

Daylio is a very versatile app, and you can turn it in whatever you need to track. Your fitness goal pal. Your mental health coach. Your food log. Your gratitude diary. Mood tracker. Exercise, meditate, eat, and be grateful. Take care of your mental, emotional, and physical health. Good self-care is a key to improved mood and reduced anxiety.

This is the time for your wellbeing, self-improvement, and self-care. Use Daylio as your daily bullet journal. We build it on three principles:

✅ Reach happiness and self-improvement by being mindful of your days.
✅ Validate your hunches. How does your new hobby influence your life?
✅ Form a new habit in an obstacle-free environment—no learning curve. Daylio is super simple to use, create your first entry in two steps.

For anxiety and stress relief, make sure to include activities that help you to cope with negativity. Everybody can use a mood boost! You can measure their impact on your mood in stats. 


🤔 HOW DOES IT WORK

Pick your mood and add activities you have been doing during the day. You can also add notes and keep an old school diary. Daylio is collecting recorded moods and activities in the statistics and calendar. This format will help you to understand your habits better. Keep track of your activities and create patterns to become more productive!

You can review all entries in the statistics on charts or the calendar and share them with your friends.

To make it even better, Daylio allows you:
⭐ Make reflection a daily habit
⭐ Discover what makes you happy
⭐ Use a big database of beautiful icons for your personalized activities 
⭐ Mix and match your own moods using funny emojis
⭐ Explore exciting statistics about your life on weekly, monthly or yearly charts
⭐ Deep dive into advanced statistics for every mood, activity or group
⭐ Customize color themes
⭐ Enjoy nights with dark mode
⭐ See your whole year in 'Year in Pixels'
⭐ Create daily, weekly or monthly goals and motivate yourself
⭐ Build habits and collect achievements
⭐ Share statistics with your friends
⭐ Safely back up and restore your entries via your private Google Drive
⭐ Set reminders and never forget to create a memory
⭐ Turn on PIN lock and keep your diary safe
⭐ Export PDF and CSV documents to share or print your entries


🧐 PRIVACY AND SECURITY

We are a top private journal since we do not store or collect your data.

At Daylio, we believe in transparency and honesty. Your data is stored locally on your phone. You can optionally schedule backups to your private cloud storage or take your backup file with you anywhere. Data are entirely under your control at all times.

Data stored in the app's private directories are not accessible by any other apps or processes. Your backups are transferred to the Google Drive via the secure (encrypted) channels.

We don't send your data to our servers. We don't have access to your entries. Also, any other third-party app can't read your data.

⭐ See your whole year in 'Year in Pixels'
⭐ Create daily, weekly or monthly goals and motivate yourself
⭐ Build habits and collect achievements
⭐ Share statistics with your friends
⭐ Safely back up and restore your entries via your private Google Drive
⭐ Set reminders and never forget to create a memory
⭐ Turn on PIN lock and keep your diary safe
⭐ Export PDF and CSV documents to share or print your entries


🧐 PRIVACY AND SECURITY

We are a top private journal since we do not store or collect your data.

At Daylio, we believe in transparency and honesty. Your data is stored locally on your phone. You can optionally schedule backups to your private cloud storage or take your backup file with you anywhere. Data are entirely under your control at all times.

Data stored in the app's private directories are not accessible by any other apps or processes. Your backups are transferred to the Google Drive via the secure (encrypted) channels.

We don't send your data to our servers. We don't have access to your entries. Also, any other third-party app can't read your data.
summary: Self-Care Bullet Journal with Goals - Mood Diary & Happiness Tracker
recentChanges: Thanks for using Daylio. We have made several small improvements and fixed a couple of bugs. Enjoy the app!
comments: Far more useful and life-improving than expected! I've been using daylio every single day for almost 2 years, which is both an achievement and a testament to the app's ease-of-use. It's still being actively developed so great new features keep popping up. An app that I'm very happy to support and recommend.

I bought the app, but when I switched my phone, they didn't saved my purchase, restricting me in use of the app. Although premium version still valid and working on the old phone. Ridiculous! Btw: asking monthly subscription for the app, for which you don't even need to pay for servers, is the most violent insult of your users🖕

Great tool to help you keep track of life. I like the fact it works with speech to text so I don't actually have to type down my journal throughout the day and it helps keep track of things I want to do things I'd like to do and just things like that. it reminds me to do stuff a lot which honestly sometimes I would forget and it's honestly help me a lot with my depression by just reminding me to like be kind to myself and things like that. I highly recommend it.

I have struggles with remembering to do simple daily tasks and keeping a routine in place. This is the only app I pay for because its the easiest to use and the only one that's ever actually managed to keep me on task and keep track of things. I highly recommend it for anyone with executive dysfunction, ADHD or autism if you need help staying on task or remembering daily self care!!

Great mood and activity tracker. I would really like the ability to still log things after midnight as the same day. I am having to customise the time and date for late night entries because they don't make sense to include in the next day. I haven't started that day yet! I think a "day start/end time" we can set would be an easy fix, much like choosing if weeks start on Sunday or Monday. I hope you consider this feedback!

title: Daybook - Diary, Journal, Note, Mood Tracker
description:
Daybook is a FREE, passcode-protected personal diary, journal and notes app available for Android. Daybook helps to record activities, experiences, thoughts, and ideas throughout a day. It lets you organize your created diary/journal entries or notes from the past in the easiest way.

WHY USE DAYBOOK? 

• SAFEGUARD MEMORIES: Daybook enables you to write a private diary, memoir, journals, and notes in the most natural way and record memories in an organized manner.

•  GUIDED JOURNAL:  Supports guided journal for tracking mood and activities, Mental Health Journal for managing stress and anxiety, Handwriting Scanner, Gratitude journal, self-improvement, and more.

•  JOURNAL INSIGHTS:  Gather insights using mood analyzer from your activity log & mood log.

• SECURE AND PASSCODE PROTECTED: Journal with lock helps to keep the diary private. Security Code allows keeping your entries private. Data stored in the app is securely protected with diary with lock. 

• EASY-TO-USE:  It's easy-to-use journaling, a routine daily tracker with superior diary/journal experience — nothing confusing, nothing complicated- its simple diary for everyday daily writing. Just write and save a journal notebook! Simple diary Calendar view helps to navigate to a previously written lo easily.


• FREE CONTENT STORAGE WITH AUTO DATA BACKUP: Content/photos included in the daily notes journal will be accessed from different devices and will back up to the cloud automatically. Never need to worry about losing the diary entries and thus safeguarding memories with the diary free app. Notepad diary daily routine included in the app will be accessed with just passcode later on.

• SPEAK TO WRITE JOURNAL DIARY : Daybook Speech notes feature enable to record voice notes, creating a speech to text entries powered by AI.

• MULTIPURPOSE USABILITY: Following are some of Daybook use cases.
- As an emotion tracker: Capture your feelings that reflect your emotional state, whether you are thankful, filled with gratitude, upset or depressed about something, maybe an illness. Daybook is there for you to rant about anything you wish to, to free your mind and thereby help you lead a quiet, serene life.
- As a to-do list app: Journal with pictures helps to organize ideas or thoughts to maximize productivity by making notes and lists instantly. 
- As a Business diary day planner: Create agendas, write memos, craft presentations as notes using daybook as a task manager app.
- As a Trip journal app: Seamlessly enable us to travel journals, including travel photos in an orderly manner. Camera capture enables us to take photos quickly in a simple journal.
- As a Daily expense tracker: Organize your receipts, bills, and invoices daily. Note and save!
- As a Class notebook: For educational purposes, use it as -  homework tracker, Assignment Planner, simple notebook, a quick reference, creating quick notes with pictures
- As a wish list app: A Bullet journal aids note down wish list quickly. 
- As a pocket diary and a note keeper app: Record your life journey. Daybook is a life diary that works with multiple platforms such as Web, mobile, through voice Assistance.

Standout features:

- Sync entries across platforms such as Mobile, Web, Digital Assistance. 
- Voice-activated features using Alexa or Google Assistant


Upcoming integration:

We have planned to include the following features in upcoming updates for the daybook app.

- Daily Mood tracker for the diary
- Search based on tags or location
- Import journal entries Diaro (.zip), Evernote (.enex) and Day One for Share and backup


To know more, visit us at https://daybook.app.

Follow us on facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/DayBook.diary/


Feedback:
We're always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at daybook.diary@gmail.com

summary: Simple, secure, speak-to-write personal journal. Never miss a beautiful memory.
developerAddress:
59 Washington St,

United States
recentChanges:
📕 Introducing Guided journal
👉 Mood Check-in
👉 Handwriting scanner
👉 Mental Health Journal
👉 Self-improvement Journal and more

✍️ Added more beautiful Fonts

comments: Really Nice... and Cool Features... but for a Price I was excited to start using this app. There have been many times where I get ideas for art projects, and experience feelings that can only be described in the given moment. It's easy to add entries and do quick check-ins multiple times a day and I was psyched to see the other journaling ideas... Until I saw that you have to spend $30/year for those features. So cruel to ad them just to say, "Pay us! Minus that, I would give it 5 stars.

The app has more intelligent offer than I expected. First, it is a great interface to use on any devices, web, phone, tablet so I'm happy to be able to access it any time. The note is simply minimal and well organized. I'm surprised that there are actually promt checkins and guided templates for different topics for journaling. I'm using more than I intended.

So far so good very simple to use and the design and layout is appealing. Better than most I've tried recently. Option to upload multiple photos in one go rather than individually would be handy, and the ability to upload videos would be nice. Great experience so far though.

it is a really good app, ive only just started using it and is very good compared to other diarys and mood journals ive had in the past. it is good even without the subscription as you have access to the diary feature, mood board and everything. the only reason im giving 4 stars is because i feel that the mood board could be a bit more in depth that just, "pick a face, what activities made you feel this way, any other notes." i feel it needs a little more but it is a great app and i recomend it!

Pay to use... Listen, If you guy offer this for free with a very LIGHT ad presence so you can get paid for the work out into creating this app, fine. If you want to offer the option to pay like 1 or 2 dollars to get rid of the ads, fine. Even if you roll out new amazing content, I mean serious content that you can't find elsewhere, not fonts, themes, backgrounds, photo insertion or that simple bs. But telling me to pay over $5 monthly when I can buy a $1 notebook? No, that is money grubbing.

title: Noom: Health & Weight
description:
Any program can tell you to eat less and move more. 

Noom is different.

Noom’s proven psychology-based approach identifies your deep-rooted thoughts and  triggers, and builds a custom game plan to help you form healthy habits, faster. 

Featured in the New York Times, Women’s Health, Shape, Forbes, ABC and more, we've already helped over 45 million people worldwide build health habits and achieve their health goals. 

People who use Noom lose an average of 18 pounds in just 16 weeks!
78% keep the weight off for over a year. 

Learn how to navigate your environment, challenge your thoughts, master your triggers, and overcome any barrier that might come your way.
Whether it's emotional eating, cravings at mid-day, difficulty with social eating, or a sweet tooth, Noom's scientifically backed-solution will help you create a plan to overcome any obstacle and practice healthier habits until you've mastered them!

What you get: 
- Scientifically-proven psychology approach  to “trick” your body into building healthy habits, faster
- Flexible coaching designed to help you set and achieve your short- and long-term goals, and provide you with as much daily support and accountability you need -- you decide!
- Personalized feedback from your coach based on your in-app activity and progress
- Tools to track your weight, food, exercise, blood pressure, and blood sugar all in one place
- Interactive content with over 250+ new articles, including choose-your-own adventure style guides to apply our #PsychTricks into your daily life, seamlessly 
- Smarter technology to identify your challenges in real time and keep you on track 
- Custom meal + workout Plans available to take your progress to the next level
- Our most comprehensive food database, with over half a million new and updated food logging options and barcodes to make your experience even better
- An award-winning, battery-friendly pedometer to count your steps 

Our team of doctors, psychologists, nutritionists, and personal trainers have created a new course that takes the most effective behavior change research and techniques and delivers them to you in daily bite-size articles and interactive challenges to teach you the skills you need to improve your health. 

Sign up today to turn your healthy thoughts into healthy actions with Noom!

summary: A personalized plan that uses psychology and small goals to lose weight for good
developerAddress:
Noom, Inc.
229 W 28th St, Floor 9,
New York, NY 10001
comments: Noom puts the "fun" in "functional" plus it's easy to use! This app has short, informative articles that always make me chuckle. I lost weight right away during the 14-day trial, now I'm signed up for the next three months! This isn't like any other wellness app... you gotta try it for yourself to see just what I love about Noom. Totally worth it!!

Originally thought I was getting my money's worth. But now they removed their built-in pedometer (which is the only device/app I was using) and they also removed the GPS tracking for when you do a workout and you want to know the distance you went (walk, hike, bike, etc). Very disappointed. I can't even accurately track my exercice anymore with this latest update they did! How am I supposed to figure out the distance I just hiked in order to punch it in manually? Ridiculous update.

I absolutely love Noom! I've never had so much fun and success loosing weight! I love the tracking calories and seeing how many I have left, all the information they give you every day and the fun way they explain it, the coach, the group interaction! This is for me. I'm going to sign up my daughter too. I've only lost 9 pounds so far, but I know I'll stick with it and loose the rest ( unlike other diets) because I'm really enjoying it and learning so much. I love Noom!

I absolutely love this! You learn how to eat better, and eat less. Noom helps you to be accountable for everything from nutrition to fitness! It is also motivational and you have a personal coach to help you along the way. You set realistic long term and short term goals for yourself. One thing that surprised me was I've always been a healthy eater, but with noom I realized I was eating way too dense. So far Ive lost 5 lbs and its the first week! If you put in the work, youll see results!

So far mostly ok. Two main complaints: 1. Step tracking. Originally I set it up to sync with Fitbit and adjust goals daily, but it wasn't working so I tried to remove the link to Fitbit but now it only lets me choose a different app. I just want to log steps manually. 2. Why do they have you add on a meal plan and exercise plan but NOT have those integrated into the app? If I'd known in advance these would be just emailed to me and not really part of the program I wouldn't have gotten them.

title: Curable: Back Pain, Migraine & Chronic Pain Relief
description:
Take control over chronic pain with the Curable app. Our step-by-step program will help you learn what is happening in your body and apply practical tools to reverse the cycle of pain. Let our smart coach, Clara, guide you through the latest developments in pain science with fun, easy-to-understand audio lessons. Identify, target, and eliminate the factors that are keeping your pain “stuck” through a series of guided, evidence-based exercises. Curable is a new type of chronic pain app, helping you to retrain your brain and nervous system for long-term results.

What you can do in the app:

-Learn about the neuroscience of pain through engaging audio lessons

-Reduce hypervigilence and fear of pain through practical, easy-to-apply techniques

-Optimize your nervous system to handle flare-ups more effectively with the “Panic Button"

-Calm your mind and body with guided meditations and visualizations specifically designed to target pain factors

-Reprocess strong emotions and life events that may have contributed to the development of pain

-Listen to interviews with physicians, pain scientists, and other experts

-Create a practical plan for re-incorporating joy and movement into your life

-Gain a new perspective on your symptoms and their significance through cognitive reframing

-Customize your experience by providing ongoing feedback to your smart coach, Clara

-Find inspiration, motivation, and support within our private community

The Curable program is evidence-based, and is recommended by physicians, physical therapists, and pain psychologists all over the world. It can be an important part of a treatment plan for migraine, fibromyalgia, neck & shoulder pain, back pain, sciatica, nerve pain, foot pain, hip pain, knee pain, RSI, hand and wrist pain, and more. 70% of Curable users experience some degree of relief in physical symptoms after just 30 days in the program.

Learn through engaging audio lessons that explain the neuroscience of pain as it applies to different aspects of life:
• Perfectionism
• People Pleasing
• Anxiety
• Depression
• Self Esteem
• Expectations
• Adversity
• Caregiving
• Parenting
• Major Life Events
• PTSD
• Childhood Stress
• The Stress of Pain
• Triggers

Retrain your brain to lessen the experience of pain through exercises of meditation, reflection, writing, CBT, and visualizations. For stories of recovery from real users, please read our reviews. To learn more about our approach, check out our podcast on iTunes: “Like Mind, Like Body."

IN THE PRESS:

"Very rarely, an app comes along that changes your life. I want to tell you about such an app, and how it changed mine.”
-Jon Evans, TechCrunch, ‘Curing the Incurable'

“A multidisciplinary pain program at the Mayo Clinic in Minnesota for treatment very similar to what Curable does (but in-person) costs $40,000.” -BizWest, 'App may change way patients, physicians approach chronic pain'

On "The Mighty":
'13 Favorite Apps for People With Chronic Conditions'
and '16 Products People With Chronic Pain Swear by That Fit in Your Purse'

Also featured in:
Women’s Health
Shape
Venture Beat
Elite Daily
Brit+Co

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS
Curable offers the following auto-renewing subscriptions:
1 month: $14.99
1 year: $119.99

This price is for US customers. Pricing in other countries will be converted to your local currency depending on your country of residence.

Your subscription will automatically renew unless your subscription is canceled at least 24 hrs before the end of the current period. To manage your subscription go to your Google Play store and to Subscriptions. 

Curable also offers a Lifetime subscription which is paid for by a one-time upfront payment of $299.99 for unlimited access to the Curable app.

Privacy Policy:
https://www.curablehealth.com/privacy
Terms of Service:
https://www.curablehealth.com/terms

summary: Used by doctors, featured in Women's Health. The Curable app, now on Android! 👋
recentChanges:
With the release of Curable Version 4, we’ve made serious investments in your journey to recovery. Curable is better-equipped than ever to identify and target the unique combination of factors that are keeping you stuck in a cycle of pain. With smarter technology, expanded education, and a thriving support community, we have complete confidence in Curable’s ability to help you gain power over pain.🧠💪

Please contact info@curablehealth.com if you have any technical issues
comments: Content is great... When I can access it. If I pause a recording it is very hard to get out to open again. I have to try repeatedly and don't know if it will work. I've given up and read the transcripts for some things but that doesn't work well for a meditation. Please fix these bugs!

I think this is a brilliant app and my pain is so much more manageable after only a month. My reason for only giving 4 stars is that an awful lot of the work is going back to childhood. I have done years of therapy and I just don't need this so a lot of exercises etc are useless to me. Some brain training exercises and the somatic taking is really helpful... Building new neural pathways.

As a musician, RSI has had a significant effect on me for years and finally now I'm able to play again. The app works on the premise that after the source of pain has healed, the sensation can remain because the brain gets stuck in a pain loop, exacerbated by anxiety and anticipation of the pain. The app is based on valid (and relatively recent) research and I'm delighted to say it has worked for me. Thank you Curable.

Great concept but app needs some fixing I love curable and what they do. The content is great but sometimes my meditations stop playing somewhere half way and it ruins the whole meditation experience. Another thing is sometimes the shortcut for the meditation will stay on my drop-down in which nothing will make it disappear unless I restart my phone. Just a bug I'm assuming hopefully the developers fix this

This app may help you. You will need to be able to tune your body to certain unknown frequencies and believe that the MRI study they refer to was not a flawed study from the start. If you are easily brainwashed this is the app for you. Worth a try if you are in constant pain. Good luck.

title: Pathways Pain Relief
description:
The Pathways pain relief program has helped hundreds of patients reduce, and sometimes even get rid of persistent, aka chronic pain.

When pain lasts for longer than 3 months, our body's pain system can start becoming overactive and overprotective. Sounding the alarm (pain!) all too often. But there are steps we can take to retrain your brain, and turn down the volume on pain.

We've helped patients with all different types of diagnosis reduce pain. The most common diagnosis include:

Back pain 
Migraines/headaches
Repetitive Strain Injury (RSI)
Neck Pain
Fibromyalgia
Joint Pain
Digestive Issues
Shoulder Pain


Here are some of the key techniques you'll find in the Pathways program: 

Pain science education
Diaphragmatic breathing
Visualizations & Graded Imagery
Physical Exercise
Meditations
Mindfulness Exercises
Stress Reducing Exercises

Your personal pain therapist will take you on your own journey to understanding why you feel pain, and work to break the pain cycle. 

You can track how your pain develops over time, and focus on the pain relief techniques that work for you.
