Simply Incredible (I don't leave reviews). I have struggled with back injuries & issues since my teens, and I'm in my early 40's. This app's worth 10-20 dollars, but Dr. Watkins gives it away...incredible. It had already helped me indescribably, just in the one week I've used it. If you didn't catch it, they paid (apps are expensive) to put their world-class rehab program into an app, the same they use with famous athletes, and GAVE IT AWAY. Dr. Watkins deserves thanks and a medal. Thanks Doc!
Just amazed that this kind of information is given away for free. No more excuses for people not to look after themselves now. You hardly need any equipment and it's free!!!
found some interesting information however I could not exit the app so I had to uninstall it

Testing this I been in a wheelchair off an. On since February 3 2018 n still have no diagnosis I'm way too young for all this to hit me the way it has I have l4 and l5 compression as well ..will update

title: Sanvello for Anxiety, Depression & Stress
description:
The #1 app for stress, anxiety, and depression with over 3.5 million users. 

Rethink how you manage your mental health. Sanvello has all of the support you need in one place: therapy, coaching, self-care tools, and a community that gets it.  

Sanvello gives you clinically proven techniques based on cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) for dealing with stress, anxiety, depression, trauma-related conditions, or whatever else you may be going through. Research shows it really works: Over 60 percent of Sanvello members demonstrate a 15 percent improvement in their stress, anxiety, and depression levels in less than 30 days.    

Download Sanvello today and have a place to feel better, wherever you go. 
 

FREE ACCESS THROUGH HEALTH PLANS (U.S. ONLY): 
Through our partnerships with insurance providers, 37 million Americans have premium access to Sanvello covered by their health plan, and Sanvello Therapy is also in-network for millions. See if your plan is covered by upgrading in the app and searching for your insurance provider. 

SELF-CARE:  
Get clinically validated techniques to help you manage your moods and thoughts, so you can understand what works for you to feel better. Daily mood tracking, Guided Journeys, coping tools, meditations, and progress assessments help you find relief when you need it and feel better over time.  

COMMUNITY:  
Find a fresh perspective in a judgment-free space. Anonymously participate in active discussion boards and chat groups in the Sanvello community, exploring a diverse range of topics from stress relief techniques to words of encouragement and gratitude. You’re in charge and surrounded by peer insights—a simple way to feel less alone. 

COACHING (U.S. ONLY): 
Face new challenges with help from someone you can trust. Sanvello Coaches provide direction, support, and motivation through 1:1 messaging–judgment free. You also have an all-access pass to group coaching sessions—live classes that help you apply the concepts of CBT to real life—and all our self-care tools within the app.   

THERAPY (SELECT U.S. STATES): 
Speak to a licensed clinician from the comfort of your couch. With live video sessions on your phone, tablet, laptop, or desktop, Sanvello Therapy gives you the support (and flexibility) you need. Therapy includes access to a Sanvello Coach and premium self-care content, so you’ll have a team and resources with you on your path to feeling better. Therapy is currently available in AZ, CA, CO, FL, IL, MA, MN, NJ, NY, NC, OH, PA, RI, TX, VA, and WA. Have a therapist you love already? They can use Sanvello for Clinicians to assign activities and see your progress. 

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS: 
Sanvello is free to download and use. The premium version of Sanvello allows for unlimited use of all tools and is available through many major health plans (“upgrade via insurance”) or through an auto-renewing subscription. Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will renew automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the current period ends. Your Google Play account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the price listed above. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your Google account settings but refunds will not be provided for the unused portion of the term. If a free trial period is offered, it will be forfeited as soon as your purchase is confirmed. 

Terms of Service: https://sanvello.com/tos/    

Privacy Policy: https://sanvello.com/privacy-policy/  
 
Help: https://help.sanvello.com or info@sanvello.com

recentChanges: Sanvello is continuously working to improve access to its products and services. This release helps make self-care, coaching and telehealth services available to more individuals.
comments: Easy to use and there's a lot to explore. I wish that the web version had more functionality like the app, and that everything would sync in between the two. It would be easier to do the thought/journal exercises on my computer rather than in the mobile app. It would be nice to have everything available in both web and mobile app.

Wonderfully calm and resourceful! I see a therapist regularly but have found Sanvello to help me in the in-between times. So far love the meditations and articles on the home page. Only thing is I wish I could change the order and content of the tiles on the home page. This might just be a feature I have yet to discover as most things seem to be easy to customize.

I would say this app really helps with stress and puts your mind at ease. They continuesly say that your bad feelings will not last for ever and for me that gives me some kind of validation. I also think this app really focuses on meditation and throughout the meditation you can really just try to let go and connect with yourself. This is my first day on this app but I went on it because I felt anxious and now I just feel relaxed.

I'm definitely a fan of this app! It doesn't block a ton of features so premium isn't super necessary, which is helpful to a teen like me, I love the community features and the personal hope board as well as the mood tracking, it's all very nice and definitely helpful

Sanvello came to me at the right time. I was under tremendous stress and not knowing where to turn. My employer told me about Sanvello and decided to try it. I love that there are so many resources in one app. It's simple to use and it keeps me motivated to stay on top of my feelings and manage my environment.

title: mySymptoms Food Diary & Symptom Tracker
description:
Record, track, and analyze your food, mood, and symptoms to gain insights into your digestive health. 

mySymptoms makes logging a food and symptom diary easy - remembering your favorite foods and providing customizable symptoms. The diary analysis reveals any patterns that emerge between your diet and symptoms. Print a PDF (Android 4.4 or above) / web report of your diary/journal.


DIARY / JOURNAL

• Record food, drink, medication, stress, exercise, environmental factors, and other activities and notes 
• Record any symptoms you experience (including intensity, duration, and notes) 
• Record your energy, sleep quality, and bowel movements (using Bristol scale)
• View and modify your diary entries 
• Create and modify your own symptoms 
• Export your food diary as a PDF (Android 4.4 or above), CSV, or Web report for printing or sharing


INSIGHTS

• Discover any patterns between your diet and symptoms
• View suspect foods, trends, and correlations between food and symptoms
• Configurable analysis
• Detailed results for each item including histogram and trend chart 


ORGANIZER 

• Add or modify your own drinks, foods, medications, exercises, and other activities 
• Add or modify meals with your own ingredients 
• Add or modify detailed ingredients to any item – food, drink or medication 


HOW TO USE

• Simply begin by tracking your meals along with any symptoms you experience
• Over time, the more you track, the more the analysis algorithms have to work with to provide any insights


mySymptoms is used by sufferers of:

• IBS (Irritable Bowel Syndrome)
• IBD (Inflammatory Bowel Disease)
• Food intolerance and sensitivities such as dairy, gluten, lactose
• Acid reflux
• Crohn’s disease
• Celiac disease
• SIBO (Small Intestinal Bacterial Overgrowth)
• Ulcerative colitis
• Migraines & cluster headaches
• Eczema
• Bloating, heartburn, and many other digestive conditions 

mySymptoms is also useful for recording a FODMAP diet.


Please note that the analysis algorithms use statistical methods to identify suspect foods/items and do not understand your diet or specific health circumstances. 


The information provided by this app is not medical advice. Always consult a doctor if you have any concerns about your health. Always consult a licensed health professional prior to modifying your diet.


mySymptoms also provides a list of common symptoms for food intolerance, IBS, IBD and Crohn's, but you can add extra symptoms as required.


Terms: http://mysymptoms.net/terms


NOTE: mySymptoms Food Diary currently supports portrait orientation only.


SUPPORT

If you experience any issues with mySymptoms, then please contact our support team - we will do our utmost to resolve the issue as soon as possible. Thanks!

support@skygazerlabs.com

MORE INFORMATION

Web: www.mysymptoms.net
Twitter: twitter.com/mysymptoms
Facebook: fb.me/mySymptoms
Enquiries: hello@mysymptoms.net

Great app for logging food, symptoms and sleep. Best I've found, easy and intuitive to use. Excellent support from the developer. Would recommend.
Very easy to use, well designed app
Works great for my celiac needs to log food entry and bowel movements but wish it would allow blood sugar results too. It's hard to find an app that does both.

Good app for entering your data (what you eat, how much and when), but the Analysis algorithm needs some work!! Not easy to comprehend, and I dont think I have problems with sweet potatoes, despite what it says.

title: Stretching Exercises for Back Pain
description:
Our mobile app demonstrates stretching exercises to reduce back pain. These exercises consist of a relief in the body in general, with lower and upper back pain decreasing.

Generally, back pain is frequently seen in people who have disorders of kyphosis, scoliosis, fibrositis and fibromyalgia. People with neck and lumbar disc may also have this pain. Regular exercise will help reduce your pain.

It is enough to do these exercises twice a day for 10 minutes in the morning and in the evening. For your serious discomfort, you should examine the doctor and perform your exercises under the supervision of a doctor.

What about the application

Stretching exercises for back
back pain exercises
Exercise for low back pain
exercise for neck pain
fibromyalgia
stretching exercises
back pain relief
back pain treatment

title: low back pain exercise
description:
The most common complaints of people suffering from low back pain; right and left sharp back pain, stuck nerve and pulled muscle, sciatic pain that hits the leg, sudden pain in the waist stab. These pains may occur due to reasons such as lying in the wrong position, sitting for a long time as desk workers do frequently, and lifting heavy items. When we look at the population of the world people, the biggest cause of low back pain is the onset of hernia.

The movements we show in our mobile application alleviate low back pain. We can also call them physical therapy exercises for the lower back. Left lower back pain is mostly associated with sciatic nerve impingement. If you perform the hernia exercises regularly in our mobile application, the healing process of your initial level hernia will accelerate and your back and leg pain caused by sciatic nerve will decrease.

If you have problems such as lumbar hernia, lumbar calcification, lumbar shift, diastasis recti, posture disorders, osteoporosis, bulging disc, perform lumbar exercises under the supervision of a doctor.

title: Yoga & Chakra
description:
YOGA: 

Yoga helps in providing care and benefit to not only your body, i.e. physically, but also helps in nourishing your mind and soul through asanas or yoga postures and pranayamas or breathing techniques. With the help of these, you can get your mind, body and breathing in synchronization with each other, which benefits you mentally, physically and spiritually.

Yoga helps you to achieve the desired harmony between mind, body and breathing and helps in correcting imbalances in your system, which in turn is beneficial in many medical conditions such as back pain, headaches, indigestion etc.


•	Yoga (Asanas, Kriya, Diet) for Treating Sinusitis Infection 
•	10 Best Yoga Poses for Osteoporosis

YOGA:

Yoga helps in providing care and benefit to not only your body, i.e. physically, but also helps in nourishing your mind and soul through asanas or yoga postures and pranayamas or breathing techniques. With the help of these, you can get your mind, body and breathing in synchronization with each other, which benefits you mentally, physically and spiritually.

Yoga helps you to achieve the desired harmony between mind, body and breathing and helps in correcting imbalances in your system, which in turn is beneficial in many medical conditions such as back pain, headaches, indigestion etc.

title: Back Pain Tracker
description:
The best treatment for one patient may be different from the one that works best on average. Guidelines and conventional decision aids provide average treatment effects and suggestions based on the average patient. However, each patient has unique characteristics that may affect benefits and risks. Back Pain Tracker is an interactive app that helps personalize treatment.

Back pain is a major and growing source of pain and disability.  The Institute of Medicine included “Comparing the effectiveness of treatment strategies for low back pain without neurological deficit or spinal deformity” in the top quartile of 100 research priorities in 2009. In U.S. national surveys, LBP is the most frequent type of pain, reported by about half of adults in the past year.  It accounts for 34 million office visits annually to primary care physicians. An estimated 7 million adults have activity limitations due to low back pain. It is considered one of the most vexing health problems of our time. Back pain most commonly occurs without leg numbness or weakness and cannot be reliably attributed to a specific cause (“non-specific back pain”). The optimal strategy for treating such patients is uncertain. The efficacy of treatments is moderate at best. A significant proportion develop persistent disabling pain despite use of first-line therapies such as analgesics, exercise therapy, or cognitive behavioral therapy. Invasive treatments and surgery have limited efficacy and significant risks. Our goal is to help each patient with back pain choose the treatment that is right for them, and engage patients for long term self-assessment using Patient Reported Outcomes (PRO)scores, potentially for more than 5 years, when many patients start reporting deterioration in pain and function following back surgery. BPT has the potential to help improve outcomes for patients with back pain.

BPT as an interactive technology to help patients with personalized Shared Decision Making (SDM) in conjunction with their healthcare providers on the appropriateness of the wide range of treatments available for back pain. Too frequently patients are unable to match their treatment decisions with their preferences because they do not fully understand the risks and benefits of the different options. Patients frequently hold mistaken beliefs about their diagnosis and risks/benefits associated with treatments. BPT helps align an individual patient’s values and preferences with the patient’s treatment choice through SDM. Unique features of great significance in the BPT are: (1) providing patients with information that balances risks and benefits of treatment options, (2) eliciting preferences based on realistic goals of care, and (3) integrating PROs in the decision-making process at the point-of-care.

The application was developed through a user-centered design approach to design the user interface for ease of use by patients in entering PRO data and to present time-trended PROs that are understandable for patients, including personalized estimates of normative outcomes based on patients’ age, sex and other features. Integration of PROs in the decision-making process at the point-of-care and helping patients directly understand and use benchmarked PRO scores are important novel aspects of our approach. PROs developed by the NIH Task Force on Research Standards for Chronic Low Back Pain and the NIH Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System Computer Adaptive Tests (PROMIS CATs) interact with and “feed” the SDM process. In particular, the integration of individual patient factors adds to the risk/benefit discussion in the decision for surgery. The scientific premise for BPT is supported by strong clinical evidence and preliminary works. This type of system has been shown to improve patient knowledge and engage the patient for more personalized care. SDM can reduce rates of discretionary surgery and improve patient satisfaction.

title: Jillian Michaels: The Fitness App
description:
Sweat daily to the free 7 minute workout or get beach body ready with unlimited access to Jillian Michaels The Fitness App's award winning personalized health and fitness app with the most advanced dynamic workout planner along with diet plans, calorie counter, and weight loss programs in the Advanced Meal Planner System (AMP)!

Join now to unleash your potential and get a free 7-day trial of Premium Access!


--  PERSONALIZED FITNESS PLANNER  --

Includes over 800+ workout exercises to watch in HD video with multiple Premium customized fitness workout planner programs from HIIT, Kickboxing workout, Post and Prenatal workout, 5K & 10K running with GPS tracker, Weight Loss workout and custom workout planner like Ab workout, Butt workout, Yoga and more!

The workout planner builds around your fitness plan allowing full customization including:

• Select fitness levels to adjust intensity of workout
• Swap and ban exercises from the workout
• Adjust transition time of exercise during workout
• Select available equipment to use in workout
• Play your own music during workout

From Beginner workout to Advanced plans, your Premium subscription has everything including a Workout Generator to build unique targeted workout anytime with 10, 20, 30 or 45 minute options to target ab workout, legs, back, butt workout and more!


--  DVD WORKOUT LIBRARY  --

Plus, all subscribers now have access to stream select titles from Jillian's DVD workout library in the Jillian Michaels app including the full Bodyshred workout planner DVD set!


--  CUSTOMIZED MEAL PLANNER  --

Jillian Michaels The Fitness App is also your own personal diet coach with the new Premium Advanced Meal Planner system that takes the guesswork out of the equation, helping you reach your weight loss goals or maintain a healthy lifestyle. Going beyond just planning your own meals, the Advanced Meal Planner System features tools to help plan meals for the whole family!

• Omnivore, Vegan, Vegetarian, Paleo & Gluten Free, Pescatarian, 5-Day Jumpstart, Keto Meal Planner
• Filter out ingredients for food allergies or foods you don't like!
• Grocery lists to check off the items in the app as you shop
• Dynamically adjust recipes for weight loss, maintenance or muscle gain.
• Pick the meals and days to eat on or off plan
• Dynamic recipe adjustment based on number of servings
• Options for batch cooking so you can plan to eat delicious leftovers!
• Mark favorite recipes so they appear more often in your plan!

Jillian's Advanced Meal Planner System is a Premium feature and literally built around and by you with 100's of recipes and more being added all the time.


-- CUSTOMIZED FITNESS FOR YOU!!! --

• Daily custom health and fitness app tips from Jillian Michaels
• Weekly side-by-side fitness app progress pics with selfie photo tracker

Download now and start your free 7-day trial of Premium access for the ultimate workout planner and delicious meal planner recipes to get your beach body confidence today!


-- SUBSCRIPTION & PRICING TERMS --

We offer 2 Premium subscription plans: Monthly (1 month) and Annual (12 months). Unless canceled or auto-renew is turned off 24-hours before the end of subscription term or the 7-day trial period, you will be billed automatically based on your chosen subscription plan at the end of the free trial or on your subscription renewal date.

You can manage your subscription and disable auto-renewal in your Account Settings after purchase or trial start. Read our full Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy at: https://www.jillianmichaels.com/policies/terms

summary: #1 Workout and Meal Planner
recentChanges:
- Check out my new audio meditations in the app! Take a short break from your day to feel the rejuvenating benefits of mindful meditation.
- I've also added a collection of audio-only workouts to mix up your fitness journey and keep you engaged, motivated, and successful!
- Try the newly added Tone and Shred - my popular collaboration with Tone It Up.
- Love The Fitness App by Jillian Michaels? Rate us 5 stars in the Play store and share your love with the community!
comments: Day 4 and loving this app!! I love that I can listen to my own music while using the workout. The workouts are spot on! I'm sure it's just because I just started, my only suggestion wouldukd be to show a quick animation between moves, or que as to what is next. Sometimes I am scrambling to quickly move into the next one. I imagine as I keep going I'll just know what each move is though. So awesome!!

I love Jillian, she pushes you while motivating you. This app is great, it has a ton of variety and you can modify to whatever equipment you have and for your fitness level. With that being said, I only gave 3 stars because the app is glitchy. For something I have to pay for, I'm disappointed that so many things don't work well. I'm leaving this review today because I just finished a workout in which majority of the videos didn't work so I didn't exactly know what to do. Please fix this.

There have been a few issues with the app, but the support always replies fast and is working on solving them and improving the performance. Thank you! Great app. So many programs to choose from, the exercises are so good and excellent advice about food and healthy diet with many recipes. I would highly recommend. This app is a life changer.

I love the variety this app offers and I'm a fan of Jillian's style of workouts. I've knocked off a star for a few reasons, though. There are glitches, including one I encounter at least once a week in which I skip to the last cooldown exercise and it resets the whole workout like I never did it. That is very frustrating. Even more annoying is that now the volume of my music changes during the workout. I found this distracting and I could barely hear it most of the time, then it becomes loud.

Love the app, have been using is for 4 mos now! I like the different exercise options and meal plans. It is nice that there are beginner option exercises, too. I love the new beginner yoga! There is also a calendar to track your progress. There have been a few random days where the app freezes and gets glitchy but overall I think its a good, useful app!

title: Chronicle: Chronic Symptom and Pain Tracker
description:
Built with the chronic illness and chronic pain communities in mind, Chronicle is a simple and holistic symptom tracker that was built on three guiding principles.  First, that any symptom tracker needs to be fast, easy, and customizable to suit each user's individual needs and to promote daily use .  Secondly, that the information can be accessed and summarized in meaningful ways that let the user observe trends in symptom severity.  And lastly, that the information be exportable so it can be shared with healthcare professionals.

Chronicle allows you to record:
- Symptom occurrences, severity, and any descriptive information you want to record
- Medications taken
- Any daily events or occurrences that may affect symptoms

These records and their relationships can be visualized in a graphical summary over a 7-60 day period, allowing you to see how symptoms, medications, and events relate and affect chronic symptoms and illnesses, with the hope of facilitating more effective conversations with your healthcare provider.  Additionally, the raw data of your records can be exported to Google Drive in a CSV file format, which can then be shared with your Doctor, or imported into a spreadsheet document for further manipulation.


Social Media:
https://www.facebook.com/ChronicleTracker/
https://twitter.com/ChronicleTrackr

summary: The simple, customizable, holistic symptom and pain tracker.
recentChanges:
Entry editing is finally here!
We highly recommend exporting your symptoms before making use of this feature in case of any unforeseen bugs.
If you encounter any issues, please email us and we'll do our best to issue a fix ASAP.
comments: I think this app could have been very useful but it seems the dev stopped short. The light blue font color against a white background is impossible to read without causing eye strain. All the screens have corrupted structure to them. Parts of a box will cover half the text and the scrolling doesn't work properly. Seems like a pre-beta version that just doesn't work.

I've been very sad with giving up my written bullet journal. This app allows me to track the same info, all in one, organized app. I just wish it were prettier and easier to read. Could you please add the capacity to zoom in, or have a larger print?
Very helpful and insightful tool, needs slight improvement. I wish that the graph would not plummet on the days that I do not log a symptom but would only factor in my submitted logs.
A good app allowing you to track all types of symptoms. Wish I could rename medicines. A tag system for common symptom descriptions would be extremely helpful.
This app does as intended. Not so pretty. But works. All my data is mine, there is no need to connect to a cloud service.

title: Pain Management/Relief
description:
If you have a toothache, backache, or any other type of pain, your first impulse may be to reach for a pill. Many people rely on medications, but they come with the risk of side effects, drug interactions, and habitual use or addiction.

You may find the relief you need from a variety of natural painkillers instead.

Many herbs and spices can treat inflammation and other related conditions. These plant-based options fall under a category of treatment known as alternative medicine, which also includes acupuncture, yoga, Reiki, and other practices. When it comes to pain relief, you may be surprised by what might help you feel better.

The information provided in this app is well filtered and revised to accommodate the need to make it as easy to the users as possible, after all you wouldn't want to ditch further only to pick up another in the name of a simple app.

We hope you find the app useful and worth your time, send us your feedback and suggestion on how to improve our app.

Lastly, please take a moment to rate this app if at all you find it beneficial.

title: the painspace: for pain relief
description:
We are angela + sarah, the co-founders of the painspace, and like you we are chronic pain sufferers.


The research tells us that using technology to send regular messages to support, educate and motivate people who are living with chronic illness changes health related behaviour and improves outcomes.


You’ll receive 4 messages a week. The messages distil the essential components of everything we’ve used to help ourselves and one another, which will help you access the endurance and personal agency you need in order to successfully and powerfully navigate life, despite persistent pain.


The paradox is; as a pain sufferer you have to actively do this work of pain management yourself, no one can do it for you ... but it’s too hard to do alone.


You don’t have to this this on your own! We’ll be there like a guide, friend and support person on your side, as you learn to cultivate a way of living that’s meaningful and has purpose for you.


HOW THE APP WORKS

This App is like a resource in your pocket that you can use wherever you are, whenever you need. You can trust that it’s possible to put pain in the back seat of your life. But it’s not a one time fix or permanent state, it fluctuates, and you need to respond accordingly.


We will walk this journey with you (you’re probably wondering how we can do that through technology). It’s our voice from real lived experience that we hope will resonate with your lived experience.


WHO THE APP IS FOR

This App is for you if you’re someone experiencing chronic pain.


We know the messages in the App will be of help to you if you’re someone who answers yes to any of the following.


• I’ve been diagnosed with:


Abdominal pain

Ankle and Foot pain

Arm and Shoulder pain

Arthritis

Back pain

Chemotherapy induced pain

Complex Regional Pain Syndrome

Endometriosis

Fibromyalgia

Headache and Migraine

Hip pain

Inflammatory Bowel Disease

Knee pain

Neck pain

Neuropathic pain

Osteoporosis

Pelvic pain

Phantom Limb pain

Sciatica

Shingles

Trigeminal Neuralgia


• I’m waiting for a surgical intervention

• I’ve been through a pain clinic program already

• I’m back at square one again in another relapse

• I’m seeing a psychologist for my anxiety and/or depression

• I’m exploring allied and alternative therapies

• I’ve had to stop work

• I’m applying for the Disability Support Pension

• I’m waiting for my legal compensation case to come through

• I can’t explain to other people what it’s like

This App is NOT for you if you are looking for a quick fix or a magic wand and it’s not for you if you want to run from your pain.


No matter what you’re going through, you have the power to make changes to your current reality. So rather than waiting for the pain to go in order to change your life, you can make changes in your life and your thoughts which gradually, little by little, make changes to the pain.


SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS

the painspace offers you a FREE TRIAL period for the first 2 months, letting you try before you buy, risk free.


the painspace offers an auto-renewing yearly subscription to provide you with unlimited access to the painspace collection while you maintain an active subscription.


Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

If you subscribe before your free trial ends, the rest of your free trial period will be forfeited as soon as your purchase is confirmed. 

Read the terms and conditions:

https://www.thepainspace.com/terms-conditions/ 

Read the privacy policy:

https://www.thepainspace.com/privacy/
descriptionHTML:
We are angela + sarah, the co-founders of the painspace, and like you we are chronic pain sufferers.


The research tells us that using technology to send regular messages to support, educate and motivate people who are living with chronic illness changes health related behaviour and improves outcomes.


You’ll receive 4 messages a week. The messages distil the essential components of everything we’ve used to help ourselves and one another, which will help you access the endurance and personal agency you need in order to successfully and powerfully navigate life, despite persistent pain.


The paradox is; as a pain sufferer you have to actively do this work of pain management yourself, no one can do it for you ... but it’s too hard to do alone.


You don’t have to this this on your own! We’ll be there like a guide, friend and support person on your side, as you learn to cultivate a way of living that’s meaningful and has purpose for you.


HOW THE APP WORKS

This App is like a resource in your pocket that you can use wherever you are, whenever you need. You can trust that it’s possible to put pain in the back seat of your life. But it’s not a one time fix or permanent state, it fluctuates, and you need to respond accordingly.


We will walk this journey with you (you’re probably wondering how we can do that through technology). It’s our voice from real lived experience that we hope will resonate with your lived experience.


WHO THE APP IS FOR

This App is for you if you’re someone experiencing chronic pain.


We know the messages in the App will be of help to you if you’re someone who answers yes to any of the following.


• I’ve been diagnosed with:


Abdominal pain

Ankle and Foot pain

Arm and Shoulder pain

Arthritis

Back pain

Chemotherapy induced pain

Complex Regional Pain Syndrome

Endometriosis

Fibromyalgia

Headache and Migraine

Hip pain

Inflammatory Bowel Disease

Knee pain

Neck pain

Neuropathic pain

Osteoporosis

Pelvic pain

Phantom Limb pain

Sciatica

Shingles

Trigeminal Neuralgia


• I’m waiting for a surgical intervention

• I’ve been through a pain clinic program already

• I’m back at square one again in another relapse

• I’m seeing a psychologist for my anxiety and/or depression

• I’m exploring allied and alternative therapies

• I’ve had to stop work

• I’m applying for the Disability Support Pension

• I’m waiting for my legal compensation case to come through

• I can’t explain to other people what it’s like

This App is NOT for you if you are looking for a quick fix or a magic wand and it’s not for you if you want to run from your pain.


No matter what you’re going through, you have the power to make changes to your current reality. So rather than waiting for the pain to go in order to change your life, you can make changes in your life and your thoughts which gradually, little by little, make changes to the pain.


SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS

the painspace offers you a FREE TRIAL period for the first 2 months, letting you try before you buy, risk free.


the painspace offers an auto-renewing yearly subscription to provide you with unlimited access to the painspace collection while you maintain an active subscription.


Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

If you subscribe before your free trial ends, the rest of your free trial period will be forfeited as soon as your purchase is confirmed. 

Read the terms and conditions:

https://www.thepainspace.com/terms-conditions/ 

Read the privacy policy:

https://www.thepainspace.com/privacy/
summary: chronic pain support messages

title: Injurymap - Effective exercise therapy
description:
Do you have muscle or joint pain? We’ve made an easy, safe, and effective way to work on your own physical rehabilitation!

Use one of our 12 therapy programs to treat your painful muscles or joints. How does it work? We provide you with a daily training program tailored to your injury and your body. The exercises gradually become more challenging as you grow stronger and your injured tissue recovers.

Kick-start your rehabilitative training and return to a pain-free life. Injurymap introduces a new way to deal with muscle and joint pain: a digital training program you can perform from the comfort of your own home and at your leisure. Our doctors and medical specialists have recommended over 500 exercises and developed an algorithm that ensures that you are always training at the level that suits your exact needs.

No complicated or expensive equipment is needed to use Injurymap. The exercises are designed to be performed at home, and each training session takes a maximum of 30 minutes to complete.

Injurymap covers the following areas:

Achilles pain

Ankle pain

Arch pain

Back pain

Elbow pain

Hip pain

Knee pain

Neck pain

Shoulder pain

Injurymap can be configured to send you a notification when it’s time to exercise. The app helps you stay motivated by providing you with different exercises for each training session.

It tracks your progress, too, and gives you a complete and easy-to-use overview of how much you have exercised. Injurymap also contains short, informative articles to help you understand your injury and what you can do to manage it.

Injurymap is CE-marked as a medical device. The CE mark guarantees that Injurymap conforms to the health and safety standards set by the European Union.

 
Injurymap is free to use for a trial period of 2 weeks in which you can freely cancel your subscription at no cost. Injurymap requires a paid subscription after the trial period expires:
 
• 12 months / $40.99
• 1 month / $9.49 
 
Injurymap can be configured to send you notifications when it’s time to exercise. The app will help you stay motivated by providing you with new and different exercises for each training session.
 
No complicated machines or expensive equipment are needed to use Injurymap. The exercises are designed to be performed in the comfort of your own home and each training session takes a maximum of 30 minutes to complete.
 
The app tracks your progress and gives you a complete and easy-to-use overview of how much you have exercised. Injurymap also contains short and informative articles that help you understand your injury and what you can do to manage it.

Full access is provided for $3.49 per month or $26.49 per 12 months.
The first 2 weeks is a free trial. 
 
• The subscription period is 1 month / 12 months and provides full access to all exercises in Injurymap.
• Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase.
• Please notice that subscriptions are automatically renewed unless automatic renewal has been turned off no later than 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.
• Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
• You can always cancel the automatic renewal of your subscription by navigating to your Account Settings after the purchase.
• Any unused portion of the 2 weeks free trial period will be forfeited when a subscription is purchased.

Terms of use: https://www.injurymap.com/terms

summary: Personalized training for treating pain your body.
recentChanges:
Thank you for using Injurymap!

This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

You can now easily switch programs.

Did you know that we have made it easy to quickly switch between programs? You can access the new feature by tapping your current program name on the "Today" page.

We have also added a small (i) with a description of the exercise, which you can read if you do not want to watch the video.

We hope you enjoy using the app and the new update. :-)
comments: Subscribed me despite cancelling, and I can't even use it. $80 stolen. Still doesn't show up on google play so I can't try to cancel it again as obviously the first time didn't work. Yes, obviously it's you, unless there's another entry on Google play called injury map which strangely charged my card that I signed up to your app with that I evidently have on my phone... Or I wouldn't be able to post a review, would I? Further it is $79.99 NZ I have been charged. I will happily post pictures.

This is a life changing app that I'd recommend to everyone! Having been through many years of severe lower back issues and visited a range of specialists, only Injurymap has had a significant impact, with its daily activities, check ins after every step, and slow progress towards pain free movements.
Using this app as I have a sore achilles. Found the exercises great and progressive. Has really made a difference. I will use this app. in the future as it definitely helps.

Developer honestly states the cost ($3.49/mo or $23.99/yr) and describes the app in description.👍 I have not paid or used the app beyond free access, but being honest is very important, so I'm assuming developer is honest about parts of app that can't be freely used. Free access allows you to read the general program description and the 'Tips' section.

The workouts seem to be well planned and truly helpful for rehabilitation. But the app has bugs and has lost my progress twice now... At this pace I will never be able to get past Phase 1. For a paid app I'm expecting no obvious bug like this that affects usability.

title: Kaia Pain Management
description:
Kaia is your at-home back pain management app developed by medical professionals.

▶ THE ADVANTAGES OF KAIA BACK TRAINING:

• Created by medical experts: Kaia was developed in cooperation with pain experts and doctors from the Klinikum rechts der Isar in Munich and is based on the National Guidelines for the Treatment of LBP (Lower Back Pain).
• Individually personalized: Whether you are a beginner or consider yourself an athlete - Kaia exercises adapt to your fitness and pain levels via intelligent algorithms.
• Easy to use from your home to the gym: Daily training sessions that you can perform in just 15-30 minutes without any extra equipment.

▶ HOW KAIA WORKS:

• Kaia customizes itself to suit your needs: Assesses pain location and intensity as well as current fitness level to create personalized training plan.
• Personalization: Through your feedback after the training units, the exercises adapt continuously.
• Demo videos: High-quality videos ensure the exercises are performed correctly.
• Motivational: Kaia keeps you motivated to accomplish your personal training goals!
• Progress: Track your training progress and see how back pain and sleep perception improve over time.

▶ WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT FROM KAIA: 

• Physiotherapeutic strengthening exercises for the entire stabilizing musculature of the spine
• Psychological relaxation exercises which have been shown to improve perception of back pain
• Extensive background knowledge about back pain
• Tips & tricks for dealing with back pain
• Back training & pain prevention

▶ WHAT KAIA PRO USERS SAY:

Susanne, Kaia user:
"Kaia is not very time-consuming, trustworthy and appealing and above all: It helps!"

Franziska, Kaia user:
"Kaia offers qualified exercises combined with high-quality information about our back and relaxation exercises. I have never had such an interdisciplinary combination and its effectiveness speaks for itself."

PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP & DATA PROTECTION

If you opt-in for the subscription, you pay the fixed price for your country which is displayed in the app. Regarding the prices in other countries please contact support@kaiahealth.com. The subscription renews automatically, if it is not canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. Your account will be debited within 24 hours of expiration of the current subscription for the next term. The current runtime of in-app subscriptions cannot be terminated. You can disable the automatic renewal feature at any time via the account settings.

Many experts are involved in the development: experienced physiotherapists, psychologists and doctors. By purchasing a subscription, you support the continuous development of Kaia. Thus we are constantly improving the app for you at no extra cost for you.

▶ Terms & Privacy

Privacy Policy: https://www.kaiahealth.com/us/legal/privacy-policy/
General Terms and Conditions: https://www.kaiahealth.com/us/legal/terms-conditions/

-------------------------------------------
Visit us at: www.kaiahealth.com/us
Follow us and stay up to date:
facebook.com/kaiahealth
twitter.com/kaiahealth
Send us and email, we love to chat: service@kaiahealth.com

comments: Fantastic app, I tried it out a year ago. However now I return to it I see it has become the most expensive app in the whole world (€99/month) so thats the end of that. Cheers.
So far not only good for back pain exercises but also a good course on learning about the pain we experience. Also, great communication with a coach that gets back to you for help.
Easy to use and user friendly
Terrible, it does not even give a demo of the experience before it asks you to pay up 99€. Can't believe this kind of app is getting made in today's day and age.
Very helpful and carry you along the procedure like an understanding partner

title: Pilates workout routine－Fitness exercises at home
description:
Pilates workout routines - is an effective set of exercises that works on all the muscle groups of the body and allows you to develop muscle flexibility, joint flexibility, correct posture and provides back and spine health. Moreover, club pilates at home speed up the body's metabolism and start the process of losing fat.

The app contains 60 the most effective and time-tested Pilates fitness exercises, each of which is accompanied with detailed video instructions and detailed text description. All floor exercises fitness classes are divided into groups according to the complexity of their implementation. Free Pilates workout exercises are recommended for all groups of people, regardless of age.

There are 6 different programs - daily Pilates workout for beginners, 7-minute barre workout and advanced program to strengthen the effect and achieve the most impressive results –  do yoga pilates anytime for weight loss.

Application Features:
✓ 60 the most effective daily pilates exercises;
✓ Each exercise has detailed audio, video and text description and recommendations of the implementation – now you can easily do barre and yoga pilates at home anytime;
✓ The virtual instructor will show you how to do each exercise and will motivate you;
✓ You can create your own barre workout free and programs and set their duration, performance and time of rest for each exercise;
✓ An effective statistics system will allow you to watch and record the results of your achievements and progress during club pilates workout routines home.

👍 Just try to do the first small workout series and take a challenge anytime. You will definitely see the results – stretching pilates for beginners offline is that fitness exercise routine will give you a great effect. By the way, with the help of this app, you can create a stable habit of doing regular sports, because floor exercises for weight loss take not more than 10 minutes a day.

Most traditional small workout series provoke muscle imbalance: strong muscles become stronger, and weak muscles, on the contrary, become weaker. This is the main cause of injuries and chronic back pain. During floor exercises fitness classes, barre workout at home activities your muscles will work evenly and balanced, providing higher training performance and reducing the likelihood of injuries. This is why so many professional athletes use club pilates free workouts in their training classes.

Now, your muscles will never work until exhaustion, you will not sweat and feel very tired. Classes include a precise and special deep breathing system. If you don’t like programs based on the concentration, then it may seem like a boring activity. But if you want to strengthen the muscles of the abdominal cavity and pelvis, as well as maintain good posture and get rid of back pain, then it is definitely for you.

Thanks to a set of beginner exercises, you will tighten your abdominal muscles, lower your shoulders, lengthen your neck, raise your chest and straighten your posture. By the end of the lesson, your spine will be elongated, your stomach tucked up, and your body free and light. Stretching Pilates poses at home will make you feel taller and more confident than it was an hour ago.

🏅 Take 30-day challenge pilates at home and build a dream body!

title: Pain Log
description:
Are you fed up with your headaches? Would you like to know the reason of your pain in the ribs? Don't you know why do you have pain somewhere in your body? Download right now Pain log and write down whenever you have a pain, you can easily have a diary with all the information in order to look for a solution. Export, send or share easily the results through vía google Drive, Dropbox, Telegram, Whatsapp, Gmail, Hangouts etc... What are you waiting for downloading the best app about pain's register in internet? Moreover, pain log is free,without publicity and open source.

Collecting information about your headaches on a notebook can help you to get the deseases. Stress, depression or not sleeping properly can cause a headache. Moreover, having these pains registered could help your doctor to identify the kind of headache that you have, because it can be migraines or tension headaches. In this way, your doctor will help you to find a correct solution to your problem and probably to eliminate it.

Now you can do easily a register by using Pain log. You just have to follow these stages:

• Create a calendar. For example: headache.

• Write the dates down, a short description and the intensity of your headaches for a period of time.

• By clicking you could transfer your information to an excel chart.

• Talk to your doctor.

Simple and really easy.

Pain log is an open-source application totally free, which is located un github with licence GNU GPL V3.0
If you are interested in the project, you can visit this link:


https://github.com/rulogarcillan/PainLog

comments: Why does it say 2 days without pain when the last 2 days have a pain log entry? Tomorrow it will say 3 days without pain, though it's plain to see that will be inaccurate from a pain log entry every day. I think a doctor could misconstrue this information at first glance.

Very flexible. But multiple entries for one day in reverse order and in dating  the day is placed before the month. The pain level is by mild moderate severe categories rather than a number system 0 to 10.

Its very hard to figure out. And i cant find anything to actually record your pain. Maybe its me but if its that hard to figure out then ite really trash. Some instructions would be helpful. Bact to the deawing goare
I'm required to keep a pain log from disability and this app works great. Little help, does anyone know how to change the date format??
Would like to see the date format changed to month/day/year. The current format of day/month/year is confusing.

title: Ada – your health companion
description:
Ada helps you and your loved ones check symptoms and discover what might be causing them – day or night without an appointment. Whatever’s bothering you, from stomach problems to headache, Ada’s free symptom checker can help you find answers and let you know if you should see a doctor.

 Join the 10 million people who have already downloaded the world's most popular symptom check.  Doctors trained Ada for years, so you can get a prediagnosis within minutes. 


How do free symptom checks work?

You answer simple questions about your own or someone else’s health and symptoms.
Ada’s AI assesses your answers against its medical dictionary of thousands of disorders and medical conditions.
You receive a personalized assessment report that tells you what could be wrong and what to do next.


What can you expect from an assessment?

- Data privacy and security – we apply the strictest data regulations to protect you and keep your information private.
- Smart results – our core system connects medical knowledge with intelligent technology.
- Personalized health information – your guidance is personal to your unique health profile. 
- Assessments for loved ones – if you assess someone else, their information stays separate from your own. 
- Health checks – your assessments include information that may be relevant and helpful to your doctor. 
- 24/7 access – you can use the free symptom checker anytime, anywhere.


What can you tell Ada?

Ada answers medical questions of every kind. Here are some of the most common searches:

Symptoms
- Fever
- Allergic rhinitis
- Loss of appetite
- Headache
- Abdominal pain and tenderness 
- Nausea
- Fatigue
- Vomiting
- Dizziness


Medical conditions:
- Common cold 
- Influenza infection (flu)
- Viral sinusitis
- Diabetes
- Tension headache
- Migraine
- Chronic pain
- Fibromyalgia
- Arthritis
- Allergy
- Irritable bowel syndrome (IBS)
- Anxiety disorder
- Depression

Categories:
- Skin conditions such as rashes, acne, insect bites
- Pregnancy 
- Children’s health
- Sleeping problems
- Indigestion issues, such as vomiting, diarrhea
- Eye infections

Disclaimer
The Ada Health App is a Class I medical device in the European Union. Registration in other markets is pending.

We want to hear from you. If you have any feedback or just want to get in touch, reach us at hello@ada.com
descriptionHTML:
Ada helps you and your loved ones check symptoms and discover what might be causing them – day or night without an appointment. Whatever’s bothering you, from stomach problems to headache, Ada’s free symptom checker can help you find answers and let you know if you should see a doctor.

Join the 10 million people who have already downloaded the world's most popular symptom check.  Doctors trained Ada for years, so you can get a prediagnosis within minutes.


How do free symptom checks work?

You answer simple questions about your own or someone else’s health and symptoms.
Ada’s AI assesses your answers against its medical dictionary of thousands of disorders and medical conditions.
You receive a personalized assessment report that tells you what could be wrong and what to do next.


What can you expect from an assessment?

- Data privacy and security – we apply the strictest data regulations to protect you and keep your information private.
- Smart results – our core system connects medical knowledge with intelligent technology.
- Personalized health information – your guidance is personal to your unique health profile.
- Assessments for loved ones – if you assess someone else, their information stays separate from your own.
- Health checks – your assessments include information that may be relevant and helpful to your doctor.
- 24/7 access – you can use the free symptom checker anytime, anywhere.


What can you tell Ada?

Ada answers medical questions of every kind. Here are some of the most common searches:

Symptoms
- Fever
- Allergic rhinitis
- Loss of appetite
- Headache
- Abdominal pain and tenderness
- Nausea
- Fatigue
- Vomiting
- Dizziness


Medical conditions:
- Common cold
- Influenza infection (flu)
- Viral sinusitis
- Diabetes
- Tension headache
- Migraine
- Chronic pain
- Fibromyalgia
- Arthritis
- Allergy
- Irritable bowel syndrome (IBS)
- Anxiety disorder
- Depression

Categories:
- Skin conditions such as rashes, acne, insect bites
- Pregnancy
- Children’s health
- Sleeping problems
- Indigestion issues, such as vomiting, diarrhea
- Eye infections

Disclaimer
The Ada Health App is a Class I medical device in the European Union. Registration in other markets is pending.

We want to hear from you. If you have any feedback or just want to get in touch, reach us at hello@ada.com
summary: Check your symptoms now. Learn more about conditions and possible causes.
developerAddress:
Ada Health GmbH
Karl-Liebknecht-Straße 1
10178 Berlin
Germany
recentChanges:
Thanks for managing your health with Ada.

Our doctors, engineers, and scientists have been working hard to bring you this update. Here you’ll see improvements like:

an expanded version of medical conditions and findings
an enhanced user experience.
comments: Pretty accurate heading. Again HEADING and not a diagnostic So people won't get it wrong about the app. Extremelly helpful, since the test I've inputed on was an already medical confirmed diagnosis and ADA has provided three oprions which one of them is the one I am on current medical treatment. So, I will definitely use it as a pre-docs visit since it helps to describe symptoms to the physician. First use no ads so far, which is great. Lets see if it stays this way.

I absolutely adore this app, I don't see myself ever getting rid of it. If you're ever unsure of what you have or need a guideline for what you may have, it is the most perfect app. It doesn't make you panic, it explains everything and is so calming when you're worried for the worst. Thank you to the creators! I adore this app and I'm so thankful for it!

This is a really awesome app, I use it every time I feel unwell. And it saved me so many trips to the doctor. The UI looks modern, descriptions of either symptoms or diseases is accurate while also easy to understand. And the best thing? it doesn't have ads, some kind of overpriced subscription or anything like that. this one is my must have.

It is generally a good app, but I put my symptoms in and it focused more on my mild headache and other small things than the actual problem that caused me to try this in the first place which was more important than that head ache, it does this quite a lot but other than this, it's quite good! It is a good way to track symptoms and I haven't seen many ads but it does need to work on the symptom assessment a bit more, but that said, it is hard to make that perfect but it can help.

This app is extremely helpful, I've used it dozens of times since I downloaded. Love that it remembers details about people other than me. It would be cool to have the option to import my medical records .... Not sure if that is something that would be possible to do? Either way, I've love this app, and it never takes long before I feel the need to download it onto a new phone.

title: Endive - IBS FODMAP Food Diary & Symptoms Tracker
description:
Simply track what you eat, your symptoms and moods and Endive will help you identify correlations in a visual graph form.

Food is a common trigger of digestive symptoms. Avoiding certain foods or keeping a low FODMAP diet can dramatically improve issues like gas, bloating, stomach pain, diarrhoea, constipation and others.

However, everyone is different and there is no one-size-fits-all IBS diet: Keeping a diary of what you eat and how you feel is vital to learning what triggers your symptoms.

Take charge of your digestion and gut health.

📉PERSONALISED TRACKER 
Add custom foods and symptoms that are personal to you and track them together with the others. Endive knows recipes and breaks them down into ingredients to make IBS tracking faster and more efficient.

If you have a condition you know about, but want to optimise your diet to help improve your symptoms, Endive helps you keep track of what you have eaten and how you feel, both physically and psychologically. This allows you to learn how your body reacts to different foods 🥑, or which triggers (e.g. anxiety, depression) are causing you symptoms.

📊WIDE RANGING TRACKER

Endive helps you manage conditions such as:

✅ IBS (Irritable Bowel Syndrome)
✅ IBD (Inflammatory Bowel Disease)
✅ Food intolerance and sensitivities (such as Dairy, Wheat/Gluten, Lactose)
✅ Acid reflux
✅ Crohn’s disease
✅ Coeliac disease
✅ SIBO (Small Intestinal Bacterial Overgrowth)
✅ Ulcerative colitis
✅ Migraines & cluster headaches
✅ Skin issues (such as Eczema, Acne)
✅ Period / menstrual cycle related issues
✅ Bloating, heartburn, and many other digestive conditions

🔬FODMAP TRACKER
Want to track your FODMAP diet? 🍒
FODMAP’s are types of carbohydrates that are poorly absorbed by the body. Studies show strong links between them and digestive IBS symptoms. A low FODMAP diet can have remarkable benefits if you struggle with these issues.

If you want to take your tracking to the next level, get weekly reports with Endive Plus that highlight high and low FODMAP foods in your diet so you can learn which of them might have caused your symptoms.

————————————————

We'd love to hear your thoughts 💭

💡Send your questions, feedback and bug reports to feedback@endive.app

recentChanges:
• Added PDF Export
• Bug fixes and stability improvements
comments: Helpful for keeping track of food and symptoms but definitely not an app for a newbie. New to having to keep an eye on FODMAPS so wish it was easier to see which was what. There is the ability to pay for highlighting of this but I didn't find the highlights were on each food item. As well, the food options assume you're making things from scratch. Or some searches food items just didn't result in anything and I had to manually add each ingredient. Definitely not gonna be doing that takes forever

I've used several apps to track my IBS-C. I know the developer is still working on this app, but so far I like it. They have a great selection of food items and recipes already in the database. You can easily adjust the recipes, too. After every entry it asks you to rate your triggers (bloating, constipation, etc) which I LOVE! I'm so bad about tracking those. There is no export option yet, which I hope comes soon. Using the free version and there are no ads, either.

Found this app really disappointing. The high/low fodmap scoring is behind a paywall. Additionally I lost confidence in the food directory, hardly any of the meals I get from the supermarket are in the directory.
User experience is just really cluttered. I looked for my regular low fodmap items in the meal directory and could not find any of them. Going to keep looking for a helpful fodmap food diary
I use it for my IBS and how bloated I am etc good reminder.

title: Pain Diary (Privacy Friendly)
description:
Privacy Friendly Pain Diary can help you track pain. It allows you to make daily diary entries recording your condition and the intensity, location, nature and time of the pain you feel, as well as the medication you take and additional notes. Records of your pain can help health professionals gain an insight into the pain you are experiencing.

The main view of the app is a calendar. A new diary entry can be added and existing diary entries can be viewed by selecting a day in this calendar. Diary entries can be exported to PDF. You have to specify a period of time for which the entries are to be exported. You also have the option to share that PDF.

Privacy Friendly Pain Diary has a daily reminder function. If enabled, it displays a notification reminding you to make a diary entry if you have not made one yet. You can set the time at which you want to be reminded in the settings.

How does Privacy Friendly Pain Diary differ from other similar apps?
1) Minimal permissions
Privacy Friendly Pain Diary requires write access to your device’s storage if you wish to
export your diary entries to PDF. All other features do not require any permissions.

2) Protection of privacy
User data is not recorded, nor sent to any third party. The data you enter is only locally
stored on your device.

3) No advertisements or tracking mechanisms
Privacy Friendly Pain Diary distinguishes itself from many other applications in the way that it does not include any advertisements or tracking mechanisms. Advertisements can shorten battery life or consume mobile data, while tracking mechanisms can compromise privacy.

Privacy Friendly Pain Diary belongs to the group of Privacy Friendly Apps developed by the SECUSO research group at Technische Universität Darmstadt. Privacy Friendly Apps are Android applications which are optimized regarding privacy. Further information can be found here: https://secuso.org/pfa.

summary: Record a pain diary
recentChanges: Initial release
comments: App had NEVER been updated! Rudimentary basic pain app. Needs improvement. Does NOT need internet connection to create log. Does not forward your info. Wish pain diagram, symptoms was more detailed/specific,. See Pain Scale and others for details.
Excellent for finding cause and effect

Like very much that this app is not intrusive! But wish that I had the 
ability to log multiple entries/times for the same day sInce chronic pain 
is consistent throughout the day but at different levels at different 
times.. I do not understand the medication portion (it is not intuitive) 
but maybe that's because it's laid out for a full day's input versus split 
out into multiple time frames. Probably will not use this app since it does 
not fit my needs. **** Update: figured out that I can add another entry for 
medication for each time I have to take another dose.....just wish I could 
also log the different intensity of the pain level at that particular time. 
***** Increased star rating to 4 ***** but still need to give more 
character space on both lines under medication lines so we can add hourly 
notes of pain levels as well as adding more character space in the notes 
section ....with doing this we (I) can manage to get this app to basically 
work enough to be useful
Without multiple entries for a day... Useless

title: mySymptoms Food Diary & Symptom Tracker (Lite)
description:
Record, track, and analyze your food, mood, and symptoms to gain insights into your digestive health. 

mySymptoms makes logging a food and symptom diary easy - remembering your favorite foods and providing customizable symptoms. The diary analysis reveals any patterns that emerge between your diet and symptoms. Print a PDF (Android 4.4 or above) / web report of your diary/journal.


DIARY / JOURNAL

• Record food, drink, medication, stress, exercise, environmental factors, and other activities and notes 
• Record any symptoms you experience (including intensity, duration, and notes) 
• Record your energy, sleep quality, and bowel movements (using Bristol scale)
• View and modify your diary entries 
• Create and modify your own symptoms 
• Export your food diary as a PDF (Android 4.4 or above), CSV, or Web report for printing or sharing


INSIGHTS

• Discover any patterns between your diet and symptoms
• View suspect foods, trends, and correlations between food and symptoms
• Configurable analysis


ORGANIZER 

• Add or modify your own drinks, foods, medications, exercises, and other activities 
• Add or modify meals with your own ingredients 
• Add or modify detailed ingredients to any item – food, drink or medication 


HOW TO USE

• Simply begin by tracking your meals along with any symptoms you experience
• Over time, the more you track, the more the analysis algorithms have to work with to provide any insights


mySymptoms is used by sufferers of:

• IBS (Irritable Bowel Syndrome)
• IBD (Inflammatory Bowel Disease)
• Food intolerance and sensitivities such as dairy, gluten, lactose
• Acid reflux
• Crohn’s disease
• Celiac disease
• SIBO (Small Intestinal Bacterial Overgrowth)
• Ulcerative colitis
• Migraines & cluster headaches
• Eczema
• Bloating, heartburn, and many other digestive conditions 

mySymptoms is also useful for recording a FODMAP diet.


Please note that the analysis algorithms use statistical methods to identify suspect foods/items and do not understand your diet or specific health circumstances. 


The information provided by this app is not medical advice. Always consult a doctor if you have any concerns about your health. Always consult a licensed health professional prior to modifying your diet.


GO PREMIUM

• Advanced analysis including ingredients and food groups (where provided)
• Detailed results for each item includes more specific information, a histogram and trend chart 
• Review events a food or symptom appears in
• No adverts


mySymptoms also provides a list of common symptoms for food intolerance, IBS, IBD and Crohn's, but you can add extra symptoms as required.


Terms: http://mysymptoms.net/terms


NOTE: mySymptoms Food Diary currently supports portrait orientation only.


SUPPORT

If you experience any issues with mySymptoms, then please contact our support team - we will do our utmost to resolve the issue as soon as possible. Thanks!

support@skygazerlabs.com

MORE INFORMATION

Web: www.mysymptoms.net
Twitter: twitter.com/mysymptoms
Facebook: fb.me/mySymptoms
Enquiries: hello@mysymptoms.net

recentChanges: + Fix for file export on Android 10
comments: I just downloaded this app but I already love it! I love that it doesn't count calories and focuses on the way food makes you feel instead. I'm also loving every other category that you can track, like energy level, medication, environment, and mood. This is going to be so helpful with managing my chronic illness! Thank you to the developer! If I continue to use it I am for sure buying premium!

Paid premium, and didn't recieve. Sending questions and suggestions via email, and Facebook. No answer because they are closed on weekends. This is a useful app, for people suffering from gut issues caused by foods. They really need to add nutrition info to the diary because those with gastroparesis need to eat less fiber and not more. I have not found an app where the amount of fiber is customizable. And for this app, it would be appropriate.

Really good set up, easy to use. I like it a lot. I can log any food ingredients that I eat, the time and date, my mood at the time, and any symptoms I get, and much more. A very good diary to log my food and drink intake.

Once you've got your regular entries in its really quick to use. I like the range of options available. Mealtimes, exercise, mood, environment, sleep etc. Finding it really useful, plus I can send a report to my GP. 😊
This is the best app I could have found to help me focus on my eating and health. I like the flexibility of being able to write notes for entries and to add symptoms. I highly recommend to others.

title: EndoRush - Exercise App for Physios and clients
description:
Welcome to EndoRush Physiotherapy Exercise App, the ultimate Physiotherapy app. Key features include access to 800+ physiotherapy exercises, Exercises for 100 + Physiotherapy conditions like Knee OA, ACL injury, Low back pain, Shoulder pain etc, physiotherapy exercise templates, customized home exercise prescriptions, totally FREE app for Clients, automated exercise doing screen for clients, clients progress tracker, and FREE injury prevention workouts. The app is designed for Physiotherapists by Physiotherapists to enhance Physio – Client relationship. 

The app offers 2 login systems; one for professional Physiotherapists and other for the public interested in physiotherapy exercises and workouts. 
Kindly Refer to the subsections to know more about how EndoRush app can help you.
  
EndoRush app for Physiotherapists: 

1.	Totally FREE app for your Clients:

Get all your client's pain-free; injury free and fit by increasing exercise adherence with Customized Exercise Prescriptions delivered right to their Phone. 

2.	Customized Home Exercise Prescription: 

Now prescribe Home Exercise Programs on the go by choosing Exercises from the 800+ Exercise library/your own exercise library. Yes, you can now create your own Exercise Library and save it on the cloud. 

3.	Patient Education: 

Every exercise prescribed to your client will have HD gif images of how to do the exercise, clear description of the exercise, and an HD video to learn how to perform the exercises and never forget them.  

4.	Motivating workout experience for Clients:

Your clients will get the most compelling and motivating exercise doing screen with the exercises prescribed by you with clear audio and visual cues with clear instructions. 

5.	Feedback Tracker: 

App tracks and stores the feedback that is given by your Clients in terms of pain levels and mood entered by the clients. Whereas the compliance is automated by the app. This real-time data will be shared to you instantly after their input.   

6.	Multi-language data support: 

You can edit the description of any exercise in the app into any preferred language and save them to your exercise library. 

7.	Cloud Storage and Multi-device support: 

Home Exercise Programs designed by you exercises created by you; your client's data is stored securely in your own cloud account and can be accessed on any android and iOS device through a secure login. 

8.	Read on the GO: 

Read about the recent trends in the field of Physiotherapy from the read section of the app. Share your 

EndoRush App for Clients:  

1.	Workout from your Physiotherapists: 

Now get all your Physiotherapy exercises as a workout directly into your mobile. Ask your Physiotherapist to prescribe your Exercise programs via EndoRush App. 

2.	Free ER workouts: 

Get professionally made FREE Physiotherapy exercise workouts (ER workouts) for 
(i)	Prevention of Neck Pain, 
(ii)	Prevention of Back pain, 
(iii)	Prevention of Knee pain, 
(iv)	Prevention of tennis elbow pain,
(v)	Prevention of ankle pain, 
(vi)	Prevention of shoulder pain, 
(vii)	Prevention of wrist pain. 
(viii) Warm-up exercises for badminton players, 
(ix)	Warm-up exercises for cricketers,
(x)	Warm-up Exercises for Tennis Players,
(xi)	Posture correction exercises,
(xii)	Weight loss exercises. 

3.	Virtual workout screen which makes exercising easy with clear audio and video cues. 

4.	Regular updates on Health, wellness, and nutrition. 


5.	Notification settings to remind you to work out every day.


Please read the Terms and Conditions, Privacy policy and Disclaimer, service, and cancellation policy in the  links:
https://www.endorushapp.com/tc/
https://www.endorushapp.com/privacy-policy-and-disclaimer/


By downloading the EndoRush app and using it either as a guest or a registered user, you hereby agree to the Terms & Conditions, Disclaimer, the privacy policy of the EndoRush app. If you do not agree to these terms please refrain from using EndoRush.

title: Yoga - Track Yoga
description:
Yoga is amazing with a lot of benefits. Our mission is to help you inculcate the habit of yoga. Instead of spending huge sums of money for yoga studios, use this app to practice yoga wherever you want, whenever you want.

Begin your journey with us to make yoga a part of your daily life. All yoga classes are tailored by our expert yoga team. They serve your specific needs, whether you'd like to lose weight, gain flexibility, fight depression or get a great workout. 

This yoga app is suitable to many forms of yoga routines like hatha yoga, pranayama, vinyasa yoga, yin yoga, yoga asanas, ashtanga yoga, core yoga, power yoga, iyengar yoga and baba ramdev yoga.


BEGINNER IN YOGA?
You’re in the right place. Our yoga classes guide you step by step so that you can progress at your own pace. There’s a class and program for all yogis, brand new or super skilled. Our yoga app also has HD capability and lets you practice from the big screen. 


Research shows that regular yoga practice brings huge benefits for both body and mind. To make yoga a part of your daily routine, we offer the following features:
 - Set weekly goals and let Track Yoga track your progress.
 - Collect badges that motivate you further by completing yoga milestones.
 - Have reminders sent to your phone to stay on track with your weekly goals.
 - Earn free Kriya points for each class you practice. Use these points to unlock premium content.

PROGRAMS - Yoga classes are grouped together to help you achieve specific goals
 - Beginners Mind
 - Flexibility Series
 - Full Body Fitness
 - Yoga for Depression
 - Yoga Workout

FREESTYLES -  Choose from a variety of yoga classes
 - Stress Relief
 - Beginner’s Mind
 - Back Pain Relief
 - Cold & Flu Relief
 - Pre-Run Yoga
 - Post-Run Yoga
 - Strength Builder
 - Morning Yoga
 - Bedtime Yoga
 - Digestion Booster
 - Yoga for Balance
 - Travel Yoga
 - Yoga for Abs
 - Energy Booster
 - Sun Salutation
 - After Work Yoga

Complete yoga app for beginners, intermediate and expert yogis. You can make yoga a part of your yoga routine in whatever form you practice. We are suitable for pure yoga, pranayama, yoga breathing, weight loss, yoga for depression, yoga fitness, yoga asanas, hatha yoga, vinyasa yoga, yin yoga, ashtanga yoga, core yoga, power yoga, iyengar yoga and baba ramdev yoga.

This app mostly follows the Hatha Yoga style.

title: Lower Back Pain and Sciatica Relief Exercises
description:
Lower back pain can be caused by many different things, but if you're looking for general lower back pain relief, these 7 exercises are all what you need.

Back pain arises as a result of physical injury, incorrect posture, and misalignments that are neglected, pulling muscles out of place. If you are one of the 65 million Americans reporting lower back pain and discomfort on a regular basis, it’s no wonder that we seek relief from this additional stress and strain.

Exercises to Treat Low Back Pain and Sciatica
Lower back pain treatment is solved in a number of ways, but not all of these options are accessible to everyone. For those experiencing mild to moderate pain on occasion, all that might be necessary is a simple pain management medication. Other options might be surgical relief or a chiropractic protocol for moderate to severe pain. If cost is an option and you find yourself in need of pain relief in between medical and chiropractic appointments, however, it might be beneficial to try some simple exercises at home to get the blood flowing and those vertebrae moving.

These lower back strengthening exercises are a great way to strengthen your low back and your core in general. They also help strengthen your glutes, hamstrings, and other pelvic muscles.

Doing these exercises regularly has proven to ease lower back pain and provide some relief from the stress that chronic pain can bring to your daily life. Practice these on a consistent basis, and you’ll be feeling better with each repetition.

Do each of these exercises for 1 minute, emphasis on technique not speed! Take time to hold the positions and really work those muscles. Have a rest in between the sets.

title: Daradia Pain Management
description:
Daradia Pain Management application can help you in many ways:

· You can consult us in your language
· If you are suffering from chronic pain or cancer pain, Daradia team of specialist doctors can
help you by giving important suggestions. We do not give online prescription of medicines.
But we can help you with non-pharmacological tips, suggesting what to do and what not to
do wherever applicable etc.
· Our doctors will answer quickly within 48 hours.
· Our old patients who have already consulted/visited us can also send follow up reports
through this application without visiting our clinic.
· You can book your appointment through this application. However, appointment must be
confirmed by phone or email
· In case of emergency, severe pain and acute pain, please visit your nearest hospital and do
not wait for our response. 
· Our advises & suggestions are never alternative of clinical examination. We do not
recommend online consultation as an alternative to visiting a doctor. 
· We do not prescribe any medicine on chat or on online consultation.
